story:
‘We’ve gotta move on up, get out of our chair. 
To make a change we have to give something away. 
School is the only solution that we have to beat poverty’ 
Angelique Kidjo

(ελληνικά παρακάτω)

  • Introduction - Involvement in volunteering so far

Hello! My name is Giannis and I am a 24 years old 
Mathematics graduate based in Thessaloniki, Greece.
Last summer I was fortunate enough to travel to Accra, Ghana
for a volunteer experience with Dream Africa Care Foundation. 
This short period of time was enough to change my perspectives
for life and set new goals, not only involving my raised awareness 
on humanitarian situation in underdeveloped countries, 
but also the willingness to dedicate myself on a professional level 
to more anthropocentric areas of studies.
I tried my best to help my elementary students understand 
maths and improve their English by adopting a game-like joyful 
way of teaching, which not only proved to raise the kids' interest 
but improved my skills a lot, as well. 

Have a little insight through my scope:

Having gained this experience, I developed big aspirations 
for wanting to assist more children in a developing community 
and gain knowledge, which will hopefully prove valuable for my 
future occupations as a scientist in the social sector. 


  • Current mission

Being aware of the existence of many scam organizations 
in developing countries and after months of conducting research 
aimed to avoiding being a victim of such situation, sending mails 
and asking for personal experiences from former volunteers of low-
cost organizations, I finally decided to volunteer with the CIVS; 
a low-cost, non-profit, community development agency operating 
especially in the marginalized and poverty-stricken rural areas 
of Kenya. The duration of my mission trip is going to be at least 
one month, beginning in June. I will be hosted by a local 
Kenyan family, and my work, depending on my placement, 
will mainly include assistance at a local school and possibly 
environmental conservation and HIV/Aids awareness raise. 
I am also willing to bring an extra suitcase full of clothes and books 
(which I will gather the following months) 
for the community alongside my personal luggage. 
For more information about CIVS 
you can check here: http://www.civskenya.com


  • Your role 

I would like to invite you to be a part of this incredible initiative with me. 
As a volunteer I will not receive any stipends throughout 
the whole experience whatsoever. Last year, in order to make it,
I worked for 4 months prior to my departure just to cover all costs 
by myself. This time, I don't have that convenience, 
because I am obligatorily serving in the Greek army until early June. 
As I cannot do this alone, I am optimistically looking for financial 
supporters to help me assist with my passion and knowledge 
at a place where there is real need. 
People can help by donating what they can. I searched only for
low-cost opportunities, as I do not expect large sums from any 
single individual. 
What's more, every fixed amount donation corresponds 
to a small gift from Kenya, as proof of my appreciation! 

Specifically:

  • 10$-19$: Personalized thank you photo 

or Postcard from Nairobi 

                          + my news update once there

  • 20$-49$: All of the above
  • 50$-99$: Traditional coffee and tea gift from Kenya 

(as a leading coffee producer 

                 in East Africa) + all of the above

  • 100$ or more: A Kenyan gift of your choice 

(t-shirt, handmade art, etc) 

          + all of the above. 

  • Where will the money go:

  • Airfare: Round trip tickets from Thessaloniki to Nairobi: 650 €
  • Extra suitcase full of clothes, books and toys: 100 €
  • Accommodation at host family, coordination and 

         orientation, transportation to and from project site: 300 €

  • East African Visa cost: 100 €,
  • Site costs: 100 €

which sum up to around 1250 € = 1400 $

No other personal expenses will be covered by the raised amount.

(Passport and vaccination costs covered last year)

  • Conclusion

I am a person who believes in personal assistance and 
doesn't trust giving money to third parties who don't guarantee 
or prove that all of it will go to the cause. Therefore, anything 
I raise above and beyond my target will go towards buying 
important supplies (books, pens, markers, chalk, sponges) 
that in my view are most needed. I will make sure this stuff is 
donated to the community I will be serving at, in order to make 
children’s life a little easier.
Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact me 
at giannislapop@gmail.com or www.facebook.com/papasilekas. 
Thank you so much for your support! 

Know that every donation is highly appreciated. 

  • Εισαγωγή - Η εμπειρία μου ως εθελοντής

Είμαι ο Γιάννης, 24ων ετών, απόφοιτος του μαθηματικού Θεσσαλονίκης.
Το περασμένο καλοκαίρι είχα την ευτυχία να ταξιδέψω στην 
Άκκρα της Γκάνα, προσφέροντας εθελοντικά 
ως δάσκαλος, συνεργαζόμενος με την τοπική οργάνωση DACF. 
Η εμπειρία μου αυτή ήταν χωρίς πλεονασμούς τρομερή, και θα έλεγα 
κομβική, αφού επέδρασε στην απόφαση μου όχι μόνο να ξαναβιώσω 
την εμπειρία ως εθελοντής, αλλά να πραγματοποιήσω μια επαγγελματική 
μεταστροφή προς πιο ανθρωπιστικούς κλάδους.
Προσπάθησα να δώσω τον καλύτερό μου εαυτό, 
διδάσκοντας μαθηματικά και αγγλικά σε παιδιά δημοτικού 
και γυμνασίου, με πλήρη αφοσίωση, αφού συνειδητοποίησα 
ότι είναι ο μόνος τρόπος να γίνουν αποδέκτες γνώσεων, 
λόγω έλλειψης κονδυλίων για χρηματοδότηση διδακτικού προσωπικού.
Το "εργαλείο" μου ήταν η διεξαγωγή του μαθήματος υπό τη μορφή 
παιχνιδιού και αποδειχτηκε αποδοτικό, καθώς το ενδιαφέρον τους 
αυξήθηκε και η διαδραστικότητα ενισχύθηκε φανερά.


Μια ματιά στην προηγούμενη εμπειρία μου:


Πέραν τούτου, η επαφή μου με τα παιδάκια μιας αναπτυσσόμενης 
κοινωνίας στην Αφρική, εμπλούτισε σε μεγάλο βαθμό και τις δικές μου 
γνώσεις και διεύρυνε τις αντιλήψεις μου για τον κόσμο, δίνοντας μου 
το έναυσμα να το επαναλάβω.


  • Η αποστολή μου φέτος

Έχοντας υπόψιν την ύπαρξη πολλών απατηλών-συμφεροντολογικών οργανώσεων στις αναπτυσσόμενες χώρες, 
και έπειτα από πολύμηνη έρευνα προς αποφυγή παρομοίων 
περιστάσεων, υπολογισμούς, σειρά ηλεκτρονικών μηνυμάτων 
και επικοινωνία με προηγούμενους εθελοντές, με προτίμηση στις 
οργανώσεις χαμηλού κόστους, κατέληξα στην απόφαση 
να δουλέψω φέτος με την CIVS.
Η CIVS είναι ένας μη κερδοσκοπικός οργανισμός που 
δραστηριοποιείται σε περιθωριοποιημένες και φτωχές αγροτικές 
περιοχές της Κένυας. 
Ξεκινώντας από τον Ιούνιο και για τουλάχιστον ένα μήνα,
θα φιλοξενηθώ από μια οικογένεια Κενυατών στην περιοχή όπου 
θα απασχολούμαι σαν δάσκαλος σε ένα τοπικό σχολείο και, 
ενδεχομένως, να συμμετάσχω σε δράσεις σχετικές με την 
προστασία του περιβάλλοντος και την αύξηση της 
ευαισθητοποίησης γύρω από τον ιό HIV/AIDS.
Οι αποσκευές μου θα συμπεριλαμβάνουν μια βαλίτσα γεμάτη 
ρούχα και βιβλία (τα οποία θα συγκεντρώσω τους επόμενους μήνες) 
για τις ανάγκες της κοινότητας.
Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με την CIVS:
βλ.εδώ   http://www.civskenya.com



  • Ο ρόλος σας

Θα ήθελα λοιπόν να σας προσκαλέσω να πάρετε μέρος σε αυτήν 
την πρωτοβουλία μαζί μου. Ως εθελοντής, δε θα λάβω πληρωμή 
καμιάς μορφής. Πέρυσι, για να τα καταφέρω, εργάστηκα για 4 μήνες 
πριν από την αναχώρησή μου, ώστε να καλύψω όλα τα έξοδα μόνος. 
Αυτήν τη φορά δεν έχω αυτήν τη δυνατότητα, καθώς μέχρι τον Ιούνιο 
υπηρετώ στην αεροπορία ως φαντάρος. 
Αισιοδοξώ λοιπόν να βρω οικονομική ενίσχυση από οποιονδήποτε 
θα ήθελε να με βοηθήσει να αφιερώσω το πάθος και τις γνώσεις μου 
σε μια κοινωνία, όπου υπάρχει πραγματική ανάγκη.
Έψαξα μόνο για ευκαιρίες χαμηλού κόστους, καθώς δεν περιμένω 
μεγάλα ποσά από μεμονωμένα άτομα. Σημασία έχει η συμμετοχή! 
Επίσης, κάθε δωρεά ενός συγκεκριμένου ποσού αντιστοιχεί 
σε ένα μικρό δώρο από την Κένυα ως ευχαριστήριο.

Πιο συγκεκριμένα:

  • 10-19$: Ευχαριστήρια φωτογραφία με αφιέρωση 

ή Καρτ ποστάλ από το Ναιρόμπι 

+ τα νέα μου ως εθελοντής 

(συμπεριλάβετε το e-mail σας για τη φωτογραφία 

ή τη διέυθυνση για την αποστολή της κάρτας)

  • 20-49$: Όλα τα παραπάνω
  • 50-99$: Παραδοσιακός καφές και τσάι 

από την Κένυα (ως κορυφαία παραγωγός 

καφέ στην Ανατολική Αφρική)

 + όλα τα παραπάνω. 

  • 100$ και πάνω: Χαρακτηριστικό αφρικανικό δώρο με ευελιξία επιλογών

(π.χ. μπλουζάκι, κάτι χειροποίητο, κλπ. ), 

ενισχύοντας έτσι και την τοπική αγορά.

+ όλα τα παραπάνω. 

  • Πού θα πάνε τα χρήματα

  • Εισιτήρια μετ' επιστροφής από Θεσσαλονίκη προς Ναϊρόμπι: 650 €
  • Επιπλέον αποσκευές γεμάτες ρούχα, βιβλία και παιχνίδια: 100 €
  • Διαμονή, προσαρμογή, ασφάλεια, μεταφορά από και προς τον τόπο εργασίας μου: 300€
  • Κόστος Visa: 100 €,
  • Έξοδα ηλεκτρονικής σελίδας: 100 €

Συνολικά περίπου 1250 € = 1400 $

Κανένα άλλο προσωπικό έξοδο δε θα καλυφθεί από μέρος 
των συγκεντρωμένων χρημάτων.
(Διαβατήριο έχω, τα υποχρεωτικά εμβόλια τα έκανα πέρυσι)


  • Συνοπτικά

Γενικά, θεωρώ ότι η ανθρωπιστική βοήθεια δε θα πρέπει 
να περιορίζεται σε κρατικές ενισχύσεις, αλλά να οικοδομείται 
πάνω στην ατομική συμβολή του καθενός, ανάλογα με τις 
δυνατότητές του. Συνεπώς σας καλώ να μην εμπιστεύεστε χρήματα 
σε τρίτους, οι οποίοι δεν είναι σε θέση να εγγυηθούν ότι 
θα αξιοποιηθούν προς τον επικαλούμενο σκοπό. 
Ως εκ τούτου, εάν το ποσό που συγκεντρωθεί υπερβεί το αναγκαίο, 
τότε θα το διοχετεύσω για την αγορά σημαντικών προμηθειών 
(όπως βιβλία, στυλό, μαρκαδόροι, κιμωλίες, σφουγγάρια) κατά 
την παραμονή μου εκεί. Θα φροντίσω να τα δωρίσω στην κοινότητα, 
προκειμένου να γίνει η ζωή των παιδιών λίγο πιο εύκολη.
Σε περίπτωση που έχετε απορίες, μη διστάσετε να επικοινωνήσετε 
μαζί μου στο giannislapop@gmail.com 
ή www.facebook.com/papasilekas .
Σας ευχαριστώ πολύ για την υποστήριξη!

H κάθε σας δωρεά είναι ανεκτίμητη! 

Cape Coast, Ghana 2015

Kakum National Park, Ghana 2015
story_txt:
‘We’ve gotta move on up, get out of our chair. To make a change we have to give something away. School is the only solution that we have to beat poverty’ Angelique Kidjo
(ελληνικά παρακάτω)Introduction - Involvement in volunteering so farHello! My name is Giannis and I am a 24 years old Mathematics graduate based in Thessaloniki, Greece.Last summer I was fortunate enough to travel to Accra, Ghanafor a volunteer experience with Dream Africa Care Foundation. This short period of time was enough to change my perspectivesfor life and set new goals, not only involving my raised awareness on humanitarian situation in underdeveloped countries, but also the willingness to dedicate myself on a professional level to more anthropocentric areas of studies.I tried my best to help my elementary students understand maths and improve their English by adopting a game-like joyful way of teaching, which not only proved to raise the kids' interest but improved my skills a lot, as well. Have a little insight through my scope:Having gained this experience, I developed big aspirations for wanting to assist more children in a developing community and gain knowledge, which will hopefully prove valuable for my future occupations as a scientist in the social sector. 

Current mission
Being aware of the existence of many scam organizations in developing countries and after months of conducting research aimed to avoiding being a victim of such situation, sending mails and asking for personal experiences from former volunteers of low-cost organizations, I finally decided to volunteer with the CIVS; a low-cost, non-profit, community development agency operating especially in the marginalized and poverty-stricken rural areas of Kenya. The duration of my mission trip is going to be at least one month, beginning in June. I will be hosted by a local Kenyan family, and my work, depending on my placement, will mainly include assistance at a local school and possibly environmental conservation and HIV/Aids awareness raise. I am also willing to bring an extra suitcase full of clothes and books (which I will gather the following months) for the community alongside my personal luggage. For more information about CIVS you can check here: http://www.civskenya.com

Your role 
I would like to invite you to be a part of this incredible initiative with me. As a volunteer I will not receive any stipends throughout the whole experience whatsoever. Last year, in order to make it,I worked for 4 months prior to my departure just to cover all costs by myself. This time, I don't have that convenience, because I am obligatorily serving in the Greek army until early June. As I cannot do this alone, I am optimistically looking for financial supporters to help me assist with my passion and knowledge at a place where there is real need. People can help by donating what they can. I searched only forlow-cost opportunities, as I do not expect large sums from any single individual. What's more, every fixed amount donation corresponds to a small gift from Kenya, as proof of my appreciation! Specifically:10$-19$: Personalized thank you photo or Postcard from Nairobi                           + my news update once there
20$-49$: All of the above
50$-99$: Traditional coffee and tea gift from Kenya 
(as a leading coffee producer                  in East Africa) + all of the above100$ or more: A Kenyan gift of your choice (t-shirt, handmade art, etc)           + all of the above. Where will the money go:
Airfare: Round trip tickets from Thessaloniki to Nairobi: 650 €
Extra suitcase full of clothes, books and toys: 100 €
Accommodation at host family, coordination and 
         orientation, transportation to and from project site: 300 €
East African Visa cost: 100 €,
Site costs: 100 €
which sum up to around 1250 € = 1400 $No other personal expenses will be covered by the raised amount.(Passport and vaccination costs covered last year)ConclusionI am a person who believes in personal assistance and doesn't trust giving money to third parties who don't guarantee or prove that all of it will go to the cause. Therefore, anything I raise above and beyond my target will go towards buying important supplies (books, pens, markers, chalk, sponges) that in my view are most needed. I will make sure this stuff is donated to the community I will be serving at, in order to make children’s life a little easier.Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at giannislapop@gmail.com or www.facebook.com/papasilekas. Thank you so much for your support! Know that every donation is highly appreciated. Εισαγωγή - Η εμπειρία μου ως εθελοντήςΕίμαι ο Γιάννης, 24ων ετών, απόφοιτος του μαθηματικού Θεσσαλονίκης.Το περασμένο καλοκαίρι είχα την ευτυχία να ταξιδέψω στην Άκκρα της Γκάνα, προσφέροντας εθελοντικά ως δάσκαλος, συνεργαζόμενος με την τοπική οργάνωση DACF. Η εμπειρία μου αυτή ήταν χωρίς πλεονασμούς τρομερή, και θα έλεγα κομβική, αφού επέδρασε στην απόφαση μου όχι μόνο να ξαναβιώσω την εμπειρία ως εθελοντής, αλλά να πραγματοποιήσω μια επαγγελματική μεταστροφή προς πιο ανθρωπιστικούς κλάδους.Προσπάθησα να δώσω τον καλύτερό μου εαυτό, διδάσκοντας μαθηματικά και αγγλικά σε παιδιά δημοτικού και γυμνασίου, με πλήρη αφοσίωση, αφού συνειδητοποίησα ότι είναι ο μόνος τρόπος να γίνουν αποδέκτες γνώσεων, λόγω έλλειψης κονδυλίων για χρηματοδότηση διδακτικού προσωπικού.Το "εργαλείο" μου ήταν η διεξαγωγή του μαθήματος υπό τη μορφή παιχνιδιού και αποδειχτηκε αποδοτικό, καθώς το ενδιαφέρον τους αυξήθηκε και η διαδραστικότητα ενισχύθηκε φανερά.Μια ματιά στην προηγούμενη εμπειρία μου:Πέραν τούτου, η επαφή μου με τα παιδάκια μιας αναπτυσσόμενης κοινωνίας στην Αφρική, εμπλούτισε σε μεγάλο βαθμό και τις δικές μου γνώσεις και διεύρυνε τις αντιλήψεις μου για τον κόσμο, δίνοντας μου το έναυσμα να το επαναλάβω.Η αποστολή μου φέτοςΈχοντας υπόψιν την ύπαρξη πολλών απατηλών-συμφεροντολογικών οργανώσεων στις αναπτυσσόμενες χώρες, και έπειτα από πολύμηνη έρευνα προς αποφυγή παρομοίων περιστάσεων, υπολογισμούς, σειρά ηλεκτρονικών μηνυμάτων και επικοινωνία με προηγούμενους εθελοντές, με προτίμηση στις οργανώσεις χαμηλού κόστους, κατέληξα στην απόφαση να δουλέψω φέτος με την CIVS.Η CIVS είναι ένας μη κερδοσκοπικός οργανισμός που δραστηριοποιείται σε περιθωριοποιημένες και φτωχές αγροτικές περιοχές της Κένυας. Ξεκινώντας από τον Ιούνιο και για τουλάχιστον ένα μήνα,θα φιλοξενηθώ από μια οικογένεια Κενυατών στην περιοχή όπου θα απασχολούμαι σαν δάσκαλος σε ένα τοπικό σχολείο και, ενδεχομένως, να συμμετάσχω σε δράσεις σχετικές με την προστασία του περιβάλλοντος και την αύξηση της ευαισθητοποίησης γύρω από τον ιό HIV/AIDS.Οι αποσκευές μου θα συμπεριλαμβάνουν μια βαλίτσα γεμάτη ρούχα και βιβλία (τα οποία θα συγκεντρώσω τους επόμενους μήνες) για τις ανάγκες της κοινότητας.Για περισσότερες πληροφορίες σχετικά με την CIVS:βλ.εδώ   http://www.civskenya.com
Ο ρόλος σας
Θα ήθελα λοιπόν να σας προσκαλέσω να πάρετε μέρος σε αυτήν την πρωτοβουλία μαζί μου. Ως εθελοντής, δε θα λάβω πληρωμή καμιάς μορφής. Πέρυσι, για να τα καταφέρω, εργάστηκα για 4 μήνες πριν από την αναχώρησή μου, ώστε να καλύψω όλα τα έξοδα μόνος. Αυτήν τη φορά δεν έχω αυτήν τη δυνατότητα, καθώς μέχρι τον Ιούνιο υπηρετώ στην αεροπορία ως φαντάρος. Αισιοδοξώ λοιπόν να βρω οικονομική ενίσχυση από οποιονδήποτε θα ήθελε να με βοηθήσει να αφιερώσω το πάθος και τις γνώσεις μου σε μια κοινωνία, όπου υπάρχει πραγματική ανάγκη.Έψαξα μόνο για ευκαιρίες χαμηλού κόστους, καθώς δεν περιμένω μεγάλα ποσά από μεμονωμένα άτομα. Σημασία έχει η συμμετοχή! Επίσης, κάθε δωρεά ενός συγκεκριμένου ποσού αντιστοιχεί σε ένα μικρό δώρο από την Κένυα ως ευχαριστήριο.Πιο συγκεκριμένα:10-19$: Ευχαριστήρια φωτογραφία με αφιέρωση ή Καρτ ποστάλ από το Ναιρόμπι + τα νέα μου ως εθελοντής (συμπεριλάβετε το e-mail σας για τη φωτογραφία ή τη διέυθυνση για την αποστολή της κάρτας)20-49$: Όλα τα παραπάνω50-99$: Παραδοσιακός καφές και τσάι από την Κένυα (ως κορυφαία παραγωγός καφέ στην Ανατολική Αφρική) + όλα τα παραπάνω. 100$ και πάνω: Χαρακτηριστικό αφρικανικό δώρο με ευελιξία επιλογών(π.χ. μπλουζάκι, κάτι χειροποίητο, κλπ. ), ενισχύοντας έτσι και την τοπική αγορά.+ όλα τα παραπάνω. Πού θα πάνε τα χρήματα
Εισιτήρια μετ' επιστροφής από Θεσσαλονίκη προς Ναϊρόμπι: 650 €
Επιπλέον αποσκευές γεμάτες ρούχα, βιβλία και παιχνίδια: 100 €
Διαμονή, προσαρμογή, ασφάλεια, μεταφορά από και προς τον τόπο εργασίας μου: 300€
Κόστος Visa: 100 €,
Έξοδα ηλεκτρονικής σελίδας: 100 €
Συνολικά περίπου 1250 € = 1400 $Κανένα άλλο προσωπικό έξοδο δε θα καλυφθεί από μέρος των συγκεντρωμένων χρημάτων.(Διαβατήριο έχω, τα υποχρεωτικά εμβόλια τα έκανα πέρυσι)ΣυνοπτικάΓενικά, θεωρώ ότι η ανθρωπιστική βοήθεια δε θα πρέπει να περιορίζεται σε κρατικές ενισχύσεις, αλλά να οικοδομείται πάνω στην ατομική συμβολή του καθενός, ανάλογα με τις δυνατότητές του. Συνεπώς σας καλώ να μην εμπιστεύεστε χρήματα σε τρίτους, οι οποίοι δεν είναι σε θέση να εγγυηθούν ότι θα αξιοποιηθούν προς τον επικαλούμενο σκοπό. Ως εκ τούτου, εάν το ποσό που συγκεντρωθεί υπερβεί το αναγκαίο, τότε θα το διοχετεύσω για την αγορά σημαντικών προμηθειών (όπως βιβλία, στυλό, μαρκαδόροι, κιμωλίες, σφουγγάρια) κατά την παραμονή μου εκεί. Θα φροντίσω να τα δωρίσω στην κοινότητα, προκειμένου να γίνει η ζωή των παιδιών λίγο πιο εύκολη.Σε περίπτωση που έχετε απορίες, μη διστάσετε να επικοινωνήσετε μαζί μου στο giannislapop@gmail.com ή www.facebook.com/papasilekas .Σας ευχαριστώ πολύ για την υποστήριξη!H κάθε σας δωρεά είναι ανεκτίμητη! Cape Coast, Ghana 2015Kakum National Park, Ghana 2015

story:
The journey is scientific and exciting rewarding the dream and magnetism is way more beautifully interesting than we thought!

By viewing our timeline towards the end of the campaign you will observe that it took us 40 years of hard work to make this dream a reality. The last 11 years we have extensively informed the scientific community of the new achievements we have invented in magnetism. Throughout these 11 years of informing the experts, teachers and the professors of physics and magnetism, we have received a truly positive feedback from them. They have strongly encouraged us to make these new findings in magnetism available to the experts but also make them available especially to our young people so it becomes part of their education.  We greatly believe in the young minds and trust in them that they, together with their educators, will embrace with enthusiasm and inventiveness the new scientific findings in magnetism.

Science is for everyone and we address everyone interested in science and its rewarding dreams.

This scientific knowledge that is derived from the invention's formation of its technology is what we would like to share with you and deliver it to you in the best possible manner, realizing with responsibility, that you can only presently obtain this scientific knowledge from us, since it is not available anywhere else in the bibliography as well as in the commercialization of magnetism. With a great sense of this responsibility we have created all the product members offered in this campaign.  We would like to share with you our work in this exciting scientific journey and make you also an important part of this journey's rewarding dream, so we really mean in practice our phrase: "join us in spirit in this scientifically driven exciting journey, make it your own dream and you will be rewarded".

What are the products offered?

1) The first product is the “Experimental magnetic device of multiple interactions” comprising two types as a device, offered as perks to each one interested in the community for making useful experiments on the new findings of magnetism.

In this sense the devices as commercial products function as "Educational Experimental Scientific Instruments" for each private user and also enrich the experimental instruments of any scientific laboratory of a specialized physics research organization or of an educational institution and these are:

  • A)  The first type is the "3+3=6 total interactions device" as seen on the first pitch video of the campaign. Each time, on the guide, 3 interactions occur between the sliding confronted magnetic constructions from 0 distance to infinity and if we change one of the pair of constructions with another magnetic construction, the opposite of the first 3 interactions occurs. We define it as the "3+3=6 interactions device" (please view first pitch video).
  • B)  The second type is the "5+5=10 total interactions device" as viewed on the video right below. Each time, on the guide, 5 interactions occur between the sliding confronted magnetic constructions from 0 distance to infinity and if we change one of the pair of constructions with another magnetic construction, the opposite of the first 5 interactions occurs. We define it as the "5+5=10 interactions device" (please view video right below):
  • The following video shows the "5+5=10 total interactions" device:

WHAT are the interactions in each device produced and how are they categorized?

The "3+3=6 interactions device" uses three in total magnetic constructions to complete all interactions as follows

           1)  Repulsion in the middle-further distance

           2)  Unstable balance in the middle distance and

           3)  Attraction with contact in the nearer-middle distance

By changing one of the magnetic constructions with another one of different construction but keeping one magnetic construction of the previous two on the guide, the opposite of the above interactions are created as follows:

            4)  Attraction no-contact in the middle further distance

            5)  Stable balance in the middle distance and

            6)  Repulsion in the near-middle distance

The "5+5=10 interactions device" also uses three in total magnetic constructions to complete all interactions as follows:         

           1)  Repulsion in the middle-further distance (outer)

           2)  Unstable balance in the middle distance

           3)  Attraction no-contact in the nearer-middle distance

           4)  Stable balance in the nearest-nearer middle distance

           5)  Repulsion in the nearest distance (inner)

By changing one of the magnetic constructions with another one of different construction but keeping one magnetic construction of the previous two on the guide, the opposite of the above interactions are created as follows:

            6)  Attraction no-contact in the middle-further distance (outer)

            7)  Stable balance in the middle distance

            8)  Repulsion in the nearer-middle distance

            9)  Unstable balance in the nearest-nearer middle distance

          10)  Attraction with contact in the nearest distance (inner)

How do the interactions of the invention become 16 in total vs the known 2 of the state of the art?

As the known repulsion and attraction interactions of the state of the art add to 2, so accordingly in comparison, all the total interactions that the invention is able to achieve are: "3+3=6" with the first type device and "5+5=10" with the second type device giving the "6+10=16 total interactions".


How unique, novel, inventive, industrially applicable and mainly creditable is this invention and its products? 

The international patent application published by WIPO-World Intellectual Property Organization is WO2013136097A4 entitled: “Magnetic system of three interactions”. After the strictest international examination (IPER) conducted and stated as such by the WIPO examiners, they have confirmed the novel, industrial applicability and inventive step of all the ten claims of the application. Furthermore, the invention has been granted a patent in Greece and Australia; also, the European Patent Office-EPO has published the "Grant of patent is intended" a notice of intention to grant a European patent and The Canadian Intellectual property Office has also issued a "Notice of Allowance" to grant a patent and it is patent pending in the U.S.A,, India, Israel and South Africa.


Have the achievements of the invention become known to the world's specialists in the science of magnetism?

Yes, they have. Since 2013 the scientists at the European Organization for Nuclear Research "CERN" have been informed with full scientific presentations of the invention's achievements by the inventor. Specifically, in February 18, 2013 the inventor was invited by the top magnetic scientists of the European Organization for Nuclear Research "CERN" to demonstrate experimentally to them, the achievements of the invention at the Geneva laboratories. This invitation came after the demonstration given by the inventor to top scientists of the National Center for Scientific Research (N.C.S.R.) on Jan. 16, 2013, invited by Dr. Michele Barone. Without revealing the technology itself, since it was not published as yet by the Greek patent office O.B.I., the inventor demonstrated in detail to the "CERN" scientists the achievements of the invention completing all the experiments, as these are also performed by the two types of experimental devices offered here.

A great thanks and appreciation to Dr. Michele Barone and the scientists of CERN, for their kindness to support us and invite us to exhibit, demonstrate and present the invention at CERN in Geneva and also at Demokritos Nuclear Laboratory in the event CERN-GREECE INDUSTRY DAY, on March 31, 2014.

Many other scientific demonstrations of the invention's achievements have been performed, informing internationally the scientists, physicists, professors, engineers and organizations as well as private companies of the achievements of the invention in magnetism, through seminars, presentations, B2B meetings etc.


Dr. Michele Barone is "Industry Liaison and Technology Transfer Officer for Greece at CERN" and "Associate member of CERN Personnel and retired staff member of Demokritos".

Dr. Yannis Papaphilippou, the inventor Georgios Kertsopoulos and Dr. Michele Barone at the CCC (CERN CENTRAL CONTROL ROOM) on Tuesday 19 Feb. 2013.

Dr. Yannis Papaphilippou is "Section leader of Accelerator Physics, Beams Department, CERN".

Have the 16 magnetic interactions of the invention become part of the educational bibliographical material of the scientific society?

No. Not as yet, because these are so new, as the world patent examiners confirm and also the patent grants confirm it; all the theoretical scientific knowledge that the invention delivers and provides is not knowledge existing in the state of the art. The international bibliography of physics and science does not include, cover or explain in any way the constructional behavior of how one can obtain the achievements of the invention construction wise and make the interactions happen in reality. 


Which devices and accessories are offered as perks?

On this stage of the campaign we are offering as perks two types of devices and some of the members of the devices as independent accessories:


1) First type of device including the guide and the three magnetic constructions,      producing the "3+3=6 interactions".  As a perk it is named "3+3=6 interactions magnetic device" and is shown above. Produces all the interactions as seen on the first pitch video. Available with licensed neodymium magnets.

2) Second type of device including the guide and the three magnetic constructions, producing the "5+5=10 interactions". As a perk it is named "5+5=10 interactions magnetic device" and is shown above. Produces all the interactions as seen on the second video that shows the "5+5=10 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium magnets.

Independent members and accessories are shown below:

3) As a perk it is named: "The guide".

4) As a perk it is named: "Three magnetic constructions of 3+3=6 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium  magnets.

5) As a perk it is named: "Three magnetic constructions of 5+5=10 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium  magnets.

6) As a perk it is named: "Compass elevator and compass".

                      The two complete magnetic devices as sets with all                             accessories included are shown below:

7) As a perk it is named: "3+3=6 interactions device with compass elevator and compass". It is offered as a featured "SUPER EARLY BIRD BASIC" kit perk. Produces all the interactions as seen on the first pitch video. Available with licensed neodymium magnets.

8) As a perk it is named: "5+5=10 interactions device with compass elevator and compass". It is offered as an "EARLY BIRD ULTIMATE" kit perk. Produces all the interactions as seen on the second video that shows the "5+5=10 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium magnets.

Please note that the guide and the compass elevator and compass can be used for both types of magnetic constructions, since the magnetic constructions are constructed to be fine-tuned and calibrated with one type of guide. The whole system is modular, user-selected and designed according to the needs of each user, so you can select from the above perks according to your needs. If you need both magnetic devices for experimentation, you can choose to order one complete set of one magnetic device and then choose independently only the three magnetic constructions of the other magnetic device, without ordering another guide or another compass elevator and compass.


           VIDEO OF THE DEVICES AND ACCESSORIES OFFERED AS PERKS

When we perform experiments it is important to also have aside and ready for experimentation the reference constructional members that will perform when needed, the known two interactions of the state of the art. We supply them as perk 9) as seen below and also a video shows the experiments performed.

9) As a perk they are named: "Three state of the art magnetic constructions". Available with licensed neodymium  magnets.


           VIDEO OF THE KNOWN ΤWO, STATE OF THE ART INTERACTIONS


Referral program

SHARE OUR INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AND BE REWARDED. With one click you can share on Facebook, Twitter or Google+ and maybe your friend will like to contribute too. In this case, if she/he contributes, we will send you a FREE seven (7) page text with diagrams, describing confronted magnetic bodies and on one column on the right of the diagrams and text is what science has observed up to now in magnetism and on the other column is the new achievements and observations of the invention. Twenty two (22) experiments are described with the invention achieving in them new inventive steps in magnetic observations. The one click share button can be found towards the left of the campaign pitch video and we can track it from the Indiegogo dashboard. You can share as many times as you want. Just one click and you might get free the above as a digital download by June 2016.


What is the number of prototype permanent magnet symmetries of the magnetic constructions that can be available as products?

The number is endless.  The devices can be manufactured in many different varieties of symmetries and arrangements as hundreds of different working prototypes have been successfully constructed and are all ready for manufacturing. As the campaign rolls on and also when we enter successfully the in demand stage of the campaign, we will be able to offer as perks many different designs of symmetries forming hexagons, pentagons, triangles, circles as the following video shows the successfully constructed prototypes. Please view the following 2 videos to get an idea of what is possible to come to you as finished manufactured products after your important and appreciated support:


Many different constructions of prototype permanent magnet symmetries of  magnetic constructions, ready to be manufactured as consumer products.


What are the materials used for the construction of the magnetic devices?

The magnetic constructions of the magnetic devices are handmade fine-tuned and calibrated and the magnets are sealed and covered completely with balsa wood. The guide is constructed from finest recyclable MDF with glued parts, no nails, metal or plastic used at all. The compass elevator is all wooden construction. 

Neodymium licensed magnets are used:

The standard permanent magnets used in the magnetic constructions are licensed Neodymium, which are the strongest of their type but they have the property that in a very small distance away from them, they lose their strength considerably in regard to other types. The neodymium permanent magnets provide the strongest possible interactions to occur in the experiments between the confronted magnetic constructions.

How are the magnetic constructions built and how do they provide absolute 100% safety for the user?

The magnets are strongly glued on two or three thin plastic surfaces and afterwards the whole assembly is well glued, sealed and covered with fully recyclable balsa wood. The magnetic constructions as products are offered to the consumer coated with balsa as shown on the pitch video and the "5+5=10 interactions" video and as shown above in the photos and videos of the product members as perks. They will not be offered as the above 2 videos show all the prototypes, which they have the magnets exposed in the symmetries of the magnetic constructions. These are prototypes and we want as prototypes to be able to see the arrangement of each symmetry, but these are not the finished product. The finished products have all the magnets fully sealed, protected and covered with balsa for safety reasons and the user never touches any magnet but only the balsa wood, which covers the magnets. The nickel coating on the magnets in some cases is reported to be possibly responsible for skin allergies and in this manner this probability is avoided since the user never comes in contact with any magnet. Of course, in the instructions of the products the inside symmetries and arrangements of the magnets are fully described and explained to the user.

Therefore, each magnetic device with its constructions is absolutely 100% safe, also with no chance whatsoever of a magnet flying out and injuring possibly the user.



Do we offer a product that delivers all the scientific knowledge derived from the technology of the invention bibliographically to the community?

2)  Yes. It is the second product of the campaign’s goal, which is three books offered also as perks to the community, covering the scientific aspect of the technology. We would like to supply the community bibliographically with the scientific knowledge derived from the technology of the invention and we offer three different books covering each individual’s needs describing the magnetic arrangements of the permanent magnets, the many different symmetries, the behavior of the magnetic lines, the interactions, the interchangeable polarities etc. These books come with explanatory text, figures and drawings and photos of the constructed assemblies of the magnetic constructions, in three different publications, to satisfy the specific needs of every one.

What books are specifically offered as perks?

          A)  As seen below, the perk is named:  "The book: Magnetic system of  multiple interactions (Volumes I & II)" having the complete knowledge of the  whole technology 3+3=6 and 5+5=10 for a total of 16 interactions at an intermediate price. Volumes I & II contained in this book include 103 pages of figures in plans, elevations, sections and isometric views, photos of numerous constructed magnetic constructions and more than 129 pages of text fully explaining: 1) the interaction’s mechanism occurring from the specific behavior of the magnetic lines and 2) the specific/accurate design and construction of the newly developed poles and fields. The complete range of the "3+3=6" and "5+5=10" for a total of "16 interactions" is covered fully in this book seen right below:

                                               FRONT COVER OF THE BOOK

                                                 BACK COVER OF THE BOOK        

             


                           VIDEO OF FIGURES AND DRAWINGS OF THE BOOK

               B)  As seen below, the perk is named: "The book: Magnetic system of three interactions (Volume I)" having the full knowledge in text, figures, drawings and photos of the 3+3=6 Interactions at an economical price.  Volume I contained in this book includes more than 69 pages of figures in plans, elevations, sections, isometric views, photos of constructed magnetic constructions and more than 73 pages of text fully explaining: 1) the interaction’s mechanism occurring from the specific behavior of the magnetic lines and 2) the specific/accurate design and construction of the newly developed poles and fields. The complete range of the "3+3=6 interactions" is covered in this book seen right below:                                 

                                                  FRONT COVER OF THE BOOK                                           

                                                 BACK COVER OF THE BOOK    
                         


                          VIDEO OF FIGURES AND DRAWINGS OF THE BOOK
                 C)  As seen below, the perk is named: "The Handbook: Magnetic system of three interactions (Handbook of basics)"; a handbook having the basic technology in more than 31 pages of text, 32 figures and photos at a very economical price. The basics of the technology’s scientific functions are covered in detail and fully described in one configuration that can perform the "3+3=6 Interactions". This handbook of basics delivers all the information for someone interested in the basic foundation that forms the science of the technology, however it is not full or complete in its coverage as Volume I and Volumes I & II are. It is seen right below:                                  

                                            FRONT COVER OF THE HANDBOOK                                      

                                            BACK COVER OF THE HANDBOOK      
           

                                FIGURES AND DRAWINGS OF THE HANDBOOK

What are some examples of products that can be manufactured utilizing the interactions of the invention?

Below are some indicative examples of the potential applications that can be manufactured by some of the industrial sectors if the invention is utilized:

1) The "ATTRACTIVE NO CONTACT" interaction, where one "magnetic construction" attracts the other with a complete air gap between them, gives the possibility of an application so that a train engine - real size or toy or robot size - can be connected with the wagon and each wagon with the next wagon, possessing a complete air gap in-between, with magnets/electromagnets positioned according to the innovation's technology.

2) Another case is the opposite application in regard to the first above, where a repulsive interaction of the magnetic constructions occurs at the greater distances and when these come closer appears a strong attractive force joining the magnetic constructions. This case can have multiple applications in lifting machines and cranes, industrial machinery applications, automotive industry, space technology, in nanotechnology and robotics.

3) From the first example is created the “STABLE BALANCE” interaction and from the second example is created the “UNSTABLE BALANCE” both of them producing the simultaneous co-existence of the homogeneous and heterogeneous fields causing immobility of the bodies. These fields of "BALANCE PRODUCTION" can be used in static and kinetic constructional applications giving the possibility of new assemblies.

4) From the five interactions technology is produced the "INTERLOCKING NO CONTACT" interaction, having as a result the two confronted  bodies to function as one without however touching and without exerting any repulsive or attractive force to each other. This technology is beneficial for the non-touch magnetic power transmission constructions transmitting motion from an energetic to a pathetic spindle-shaft achieving 100% non-friction involvement and can be used in the manufacturing of non-touch bearings, gears, couplings and multiple assemblies of power transmission. Also prosthetic members in humans can be built with this technology having an extremely low coefficient of friction between the member joints.

COMPLETELY NEW TYPES OF MAGNETIC INTERACTIONS AS NEVER BEFORE BEEN OBSERVED IN MAGNETISM:

The "ATTRACTIVE NO CONTACT" interaction, where one solid body "magnetic construction" attracts the other solid body "magnetic construction" with  a complete air gap between them.

The “STABLE BALANCE” interaction and the “UNSTABLE BALANCE” both of them producing the simultaneous co-existence of the homogeneous and heterogeneous fields causing immobility of the bodies.

The "INTERLOCKING NO CONTACT" interaction, having as a result the two confronted solid bodies to function as one without however touching and without exerting any repulsive or attractive force to each other.

What is the initial funding goal and what is our program in investing wisely the contributed amount?

The need:

The above two products as 1) magnetic devices and 2) books have the important need of your support for covering the final cost of producing the manufacturing of the two different types of  magnetic devices and for covering the publication costs of the three different books.

All the prototypes-devices are completely ready - in all stages of R&D - for manufacturing and also the books are completed - in all stages from editing to proof reading and final corrections.The amount needed for covering the cost of producing the manufacturing of the two different types of devices and publishing the three different books is calculated at 20.000 USD total initial flexible funding goal. This is our initial funding goal and it is flexible because we will be able to fulfill all our perk obligations, independently of the reached goal and that is our promise and guarantee to the community in regard to the integrity of our campaign offers. 

The delivery of the perks:

The perks regarding the three books will be ready for delivery in September 2016 and all the perks regarding the magnetic devices and its members will be ready for delivery in October 2016  (please view timeline's last table).

What happens if the initial funding goal is over-passed?

If the initial funding goal is over-passed we will be able to initialize our stretch goals (please view below text on stretch goals) in regard to the creation of the open source interactive platform and also offer some surprise perks in regard to manufacturing more needed by you arrangements of symmetries for the magnetic constructions.

What is our relationship and participation regarding the community's needs?

We need your feedback, your suggestions and needs are important to us;  whether you are an individual, a research team or a scientist, a professor or a high school, college or university physics laboratory responsible person and you would like more info. get in touch; we want to satisfy your specific needs.

If the real world is now: 16 magnetic interactions vs the known two, one can imagine what more and new real, virtual or imaginary creations can be invented by all you geniuses out there!


What are the stretch goals of the open source interactive platform?

3) The third product of the campaign is our offer to the community to build together with the community an open source interactive platform and will be programmed by us in the stretch goals in the very specific stages of creation. The stretch goals then will include what we would like to offer as scientific knowledge of the technology to everyone in the community, allowing each and every one to become a member of this open source interactive platform. It will possess as a subject the whole scientific data of the “Magnetic system of multiple interactions” in its design, creation and development. 

What will be our contribution and supply to this open source interactive platform?

              We will create the open source interactive platform with all needed material and human personnel to support it, also, supply the source code which will have the core aspects of all the details covering the whole new scientific aspect of the invention. Also, we will work extensively and continuously for informing in the best way possible the platform with the innermost scientific details involved in this new magnetic technology enriching all the new design and construction possibilities that arise. The enlisted members of the platform will be able to enrich the code with their own knowledge, ideas and developments and have a chance to interact with the designing of the platform’s data and designing capabilities.

Graphics, animation, forums and magnetic interactions in real time:

               The platform will possess capabilities in graphics enriched by scientific data of each different case, animations of interactions in real time, including all the cases of the invention and all its accomplished interactions. Forums will be built according to the subjects concerning the needs of the members and groups will be able to form and work on specific projects, whether scientific, technological or theoretical.

Magnetic database, public domain and private sector involvement:

     Also, this open platform will become an important bibliographical magnetic/electromagnetic database for organizations, universities, colleges, libraries and also interested companies, since there will be the possibility of sharing the knowledge with each member in the community. This will give ignition to many other initiatives that will occur since the world of open share especially in valuable knowledge subjects is very fast growing and is also becoming very valuable in the public domain but also in the private sector. The educational process and delivery of scientific and technological information of the platform will be extremely valuable, since this technology is very far ahead of the current bibliographical knowledge and the platform will enable all educators and students to not only expand their know-how capabilities but also effectively use the new magnetic findings and possibilities.

Open architecture scientific know-how of the "core technology":

We are offering an open-architecture technology; we keep all rights reserved for the inventive intellectual and industrial patented scale of the technology and all copyrights for the intellectual inventiveness of the scientific work and scientific findings. However, everything else that does not involve patents and copyrights, we offer it as an open-architecture platform able to incorporate an endless number of magnetic and electromagnetic products that will use the science and technology of the invention as a "core technology".

Your support is very important for creating this open source interactive platform and that is the reason we have placed it in this campaign as a need that will be funded by the stretch goals.

Risks & Challenges

The invention took 24 years of extremely hard work to become a reality. It took another 12 years in R&D to be refined in all its aspects and details, to be complete in every aspect, theoretical, technological and scientific wise. To possess hundreds of prototype symmetries of permanent magnet arrangements ready right now to be manufactured, to be able to have ready these prototypes for consumer designed products, so as products they are 100% safe for use. To prepare the three books with the scientific know-how involved in the technology of the invention. Also, it took 4 years from 2012 up to now for the patent applications, international and national to be published, to be granted and to be patent pending and also all the patent work had to be prepared in a very complete legal manner so that the technology would be patented in a correct legal manner.  

Presently, with your support which we believe combined with our guaranteed human presence in all types of transactions, we do have a strong belief that all new challenges and risks that might come in our way - and we do not under-estimate them - will be over-passed with success.



Are the products completely ready for use?

Yes, they are completely ready, as you take them out of the package you can start right away to perform the experiments.

PRECAUTIONS IN REGARD TO MAGNETIC FIELDS: If you wear pacemakers or implanted heart defibrillators the magnetic devices are not suitable for use by you. You might experience illness due to your pacemaker’s switching into test mode. Your heart defibrillator might stop working. If you wear these devices you have to stay at least 2 meters away from the magnetic devices, you can view them at a distance but you are strongly advised not to use them. Warn others who might wear these devices to stay away and not use the magnetic devices.

- Although the experiments are exciting and also surprising and interest very much the children, please consider that magnets are not toys and children should always be guided by an adult when using the magnetic devices which are magnetic scientific instruments.

- Please use and store the magnetic devices as scientific instruments away from devices that might be de-magnetized.

The journey
is scientific and exciting rewarding the dream and magnetism is way more beautifully interesting than we thought!






By viewing our timeline
towards the end of the campaign you will observe that it took us 40 years of
hard work to make this dream a reality. The last 11 years we have extensively
informed the scientific community of the new achievements we have invented in
magnetism. Throughout these 11 years of informing the experts, teachers and the
professors of physics and magnetism, we have received a truly positive feedback
from them. They have strongly encouraged us to make these new findings in
magnetism available to the experts but also make them available especially to
our young people so it becomes part of their education.  We greatly believe in the young
minds and trust in them that they, together with their educators, will embrace
with enthusiasm and inventiveness the new scientific findings in magnetism.




Science is
for everyone and we address everyone interested in science and its rewarding
dreams.






This scientific knowledge that
is derived from the invention's formation of its technology is what we would
like to share with you and deliver it to you in the best possible manner,
realizing with responsibility, that you can only presently obtain this
scientific knowledge from us, since it is not available anywhere else in the
bibliography as well as in the commercialization of magnetism. With a great sense of this responsibility we have
created all the product members offered in this campaign.  We would like
to share with you our work in this exciting scientific journey and make you
also an important part of this journey's rewarding dream, so we really mean in practice our
phrase: "join us in spirit in this scientifically
driven exciting journey, make it your own dream and you will be rewarded".







What are the products offered?

1) The first product is the “Experimental magnetic device of multiple interactions” comprising two types as a device, offered as perks to each one interested in the
community for making useful experiments on the new findings of magnetism.
In this sense the devices as commercial products function as "Educational Experimental Scientific Instruments" for each private user and also enrich the experimental instruments of any scientific laboratory of a specialized physics research organization or of an educational institution and these are:



A) 
The
first type is the "3+3=6 total interactions device" as seen on the first pitch
video of the campaign. Each time, on the guide, 3 interactions occur between
the sliding confronted magnetic constructions from 0 distance to infinity and
if we change one of the pair of constructions with another magnetic
construction, the opposite of the first 3 interactions occurs. We define it as the "3+3=6 interactions device" (please view first pitch video).


B) 
The
second type is the "5+5=10 total interactions device" as viewed on the video
right below. Each time, on the guide, 5 interactions occur between the sliding confronted
magnetic constructions from 0 distance to infinity and if we change one of the
pair of constructions with another magnetic construction, the opposite of the
first 5 interactions occurs. We define it as the "5+5=10 interactions
device" (please view video right below):


The following video shows the "5+5=10 total interactions"
device:


WHAT are the interactions in each device produced and how are they categorized?



The "3+3=6
interactions device" uses three in total magnetic
constructions to complete all interactions as follows

           1)  Repulsion in the
middle-further distance
           2)  Unstable balance in the middle distance and
           3)  Attraction with contact in the nearer-middle distance





By changing one of the magnetic constructions
with another one of different construction but keeping one magnetic
construction of the previous two on the guide, the opposite of the above
interactions are created as follows:
            4) 
Attraction
no-contact in the middle further distance
            5) 
Stable
balance in the middle distance and
            6) 
Repulsion
in the near-middle distance




The "5+5=10
interactions device" also uses three in total
magnetic constructions to complete
all interactions as follows:         

           1)  Repulsion in the
middle-further distance (outer)

           2) 
Unstable
balance in the middle distance
           3) 
Attraction
no-contact in the nearer-middle distance
           4) 
Stable
balance in the nearest-nearer middle distance
           5) 
Repulsion
in the nearest distance (inner)

By changing one of the magnetic constructions
with another one of different construction but keeping one magnetic
construction of the previous two on the guide, the opposite of the above
interactions are created as follows:
            6) 
Attraction
no-contact in the middle-further distance (outer)
            7) 
Stable
balance in the middle distance
            8) 
Repulsion
in the nearer-middle distance
            9) 
Unstable
balance in the nearest-nearer middle distance
          10) 
Attraction
with contact in the nearest distance (inner)
How do the
interactions of the invention become 16 in total vs the known 2 of the state
of the art?

As
the known repulsion and attraction interactions of the state of the art add to
2, so accordingly in comparison, all the total interactions that the invention
is able to achieve are: "3+3=6" with the first type device and "5+5=10" with the
second type device giving the "6+10=16 total interactions".




How unique, novel, inventive, industrially applicable and mainly creditable is this invention and its products? 

The international patent application published by WIPO-World Intellectual Property Organization is WO2013136097A4 entitled: “Magnetic system of three interactions”. After the strictest international examination (IPER) conducted and stated as such by the WIPO examiners, they have confirmed the novel, industrial applicability and inventive step of all the ten claims of the application. Furthermore, the invention has been granted a patent in Greece and Australia; also, the European Patent Office-EPO has published the "Grant of patent is intended" a notice of intention to grant a European patent and The Canadian Intellectual property Office has also issued a "Notice of Allowance" to grant a patent and it is patent pending in the U.S.A,, India, Israel and South Africa.



Have the achievements of the invention become known to the world's specialists in the science of magnetism?
Yes, they have. Since 2013 the scientists at the European Organization for Nuclear Research "CERN" have been informed with full scientific presentations of the invention's achievements by the inventor. Specifically, in February 18, 2013 the inventor was invited by the top magnetic scientists of the European Organization for Nuclear Research "CERN" to demonstrate experimentally to them, the achievements of the invention at the Geneva laboratories. This invitation came after the demonstration given by the inventor to top scientists of the National Center for Scientific Research (N.C.S.R.) on Jan. 16, 2013, invited by Dr. Michele Barone. Without revealing the technology itself, since it was not published as yet by the Greek patent office O.B.I., the inventor demonstrated in detail to the "CERN" scientists the achievements of the invention completing all the experiments, as these are also performed by the two types of experimental devices offered here.
A great thanks and appreciation to Dr. Michele Barone and the scientists of CERN, for their kindness to support us and invite us to exhibit, demonstrate and present the invention at CERN in Geneva and also at Demokritos Nuclear Laboratory in the event CERN-GREECE INDUSTRY DAY, on March 31, 2014.
Many other scientific demonstrations of the invention's achievements have been performed, informing internationally the scientists, physicists, professors, engineers and organizations as well as private companies of the achievements of the invention in magnetism, through seminars, presentations, B2B meetings etc.


Dr. Michele Barone is "Industry Liaison and Technology Transfer Officer for Greece at CERN" and "Associate member of CERN Personnel and retired staff member of Demokritos".

Dr. Yannis Papaphilippou, the inventor Georgios Kertsopoulos and Dr. Michele Barone at the CCC (CERN CENTRAL CONTROL ROOM) on Tuesday 19 Feb. 2013.
Dr. Yannis Papaphilippou is "Section leader of Accelerator Physics, Beams Department, CERN".
Have the 16 magnetic interactions of the invention become part of the educational bibliographical material of the scientific society?
No. Not as yet, because these are so new, as the world patent examiners confirm and also the patent grants confirm it; all the theoretical scientific knowledge that the invention delivers and provides is not knowledge existing in the state of the art. The international bibliography of physics and science does not include, cover or explain in any way the constructional behavior of how one can obtain the achievements of the invention construction wise and make the interactions happen in reality. 

Which
devices and accessories are offered as perks?
On this stage of the campaign we are offering
as perks two types of devices and some of the members of the devices as independent accessories:






1) First type of device including the guide and the three magnetic constructions,      producing the "3+3=6 interactions".  As a perk it is named "3+3=6 interactions magnetic device" and is shown above. Produces all the interactions as seen on the first pitch video. Available with licensed neodymium magnets.




2) Second type of device including the guide and the three magnetic constructions, producing the "5+5=10 interactions". As a perk it is named "5+5=10 interactions magnetic device" and is shown above. Produces all the interactions as seen on the second video that shows the "5+5=10 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium magnets.
Independent members and accessories are shown below:




3) As a perk it is named: "The guide".





4) As a perk it is named: "Three magnetic constructions of 3+3=6 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium  magnets.



5) As a perk it is named: "Three magnetic constructions of 5+5=10 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium  magnets.



6) As a perk it is named: "Compass elevator and compass".
                      The two complete magnetic devices as sets with all                             accessories included are shown below:





7) As a perk it is named: "3+3=6 interactions device with compass elevator and compass". It is offered as a featured "SUPER EARLY BIRD BASIC" kit perk. Produces all the interactions as seen on the first pitch video. Available with licensed neodymium magnets.






8) As a perk it is named: "5+5=10 interactions device with compass elevator and compass". It is offered as an "EARLY BIRD ULTIMATE" kit perk. Produces all the interactions as seen on the second video that shows the "5+5=10 interactions". Available with licensed neodymium magnets.
Please note that the guide and the compass elevator and compass can be used for both types of magnetic constructions, since the magnetic constructions are constructed to be fine-tuned and calibrated with one type of guide. The whole system is modular, user-selected and designed according to the needs of each user, so you can select from the above perks according to your needs. If you need both magnetic devices for experimentation, you can choose to order one complete set of one magnetic device and then choose independently only the three magnetic constructions of the other magnetic device, without ordering another guide or another compass elevator and compass.

           VIDEO OF THE DEVICES AND ACCESSORIES OFFERED AS PERKS
When we perform experiments it is important to also have aside and ready for experimentation the reference constructional members that will perform when needed, the known two interactions of the state of the art. We supply them as perk 9) as seen below and also a video shows the experiments performed.


9) As a perk they are named: "Three state of the art magnetic constructions". Available with licensed neodymium  magnets.
