INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN AND BE REWARDED. With one click you can share on Facebook,
Twitter or Google+ and maybe your friend will like to contribute too. In this
case, if she/he contributes, we will send you a FREE seven (7) page text with
diagrams, describing confronted magnetic bodies and on one column on the right
of the diagrams and text is what science has observed up to now in magnetism
and on the other column is the new achievements and observations of the
invention. Twenty two (22) experiments are described with the invention
achieving in them new inventive steps in magnetic observations. The one click share button can
be found towards the left of the campaign pitch video and we can track it from the
Indiegogo dashboard. You can share as many times as you want. Just one click
and you might get free the above as a digital download by June 2016.



What is the number of prototype permanent magnet symmetries of the magnetic constructions that can be available as products?

The number is endless.  The devices can be manufactured in many different varieties of symmetries and arrangements as hundreds of different working prototypes have been successfully constructed and are all ready for manufacturing. As the campaign rolls on and also when we enter successfully the in demand stage of the campaign, we will be able to offer as perks many different designs of symmetries forming hexagons, pentagons, triangles, circles as the following video shows the successfully constructed prototypes. Please view the following 2 videos to get an idea of what is possible to come to you as finished manufactured products after your important and appreciated support:




Many different constructions of prototype permanent
magnet symmetries of  magnetic
constructions, ready to be manufactured as consumer products.
What are the materials used for the construction of the magnetic devices?
The magnetic constructions of the magnetic devices are handmade fine-tuned and calibrated and the magnets are sealed and covered completely with balsa wood. The guide is constructed from finest recyclable MDF with glued parts, no nails, metal or plastic used at all. The compass elevator is all wooden construction. 
Neodymium licensed magnets are used:
The standard permanent magnets used in the magnetic constructions are licensed Neodymium, which are the strongest of their type but they have the property that in a very small distance away from them, they lose their strength considerably in regard to other types. The neodymium permanent magnets provide the strongest possible interactions to occur in the experiments between the confronted magnetic constructions. 
How are the magnetic constructions built and how do they provide absolute 100% safety for the user?
The magnets are strongly glued on two or three thin plastic surfaces and afterwards the whole assembly is well glued, sealed and covered with fully recyclable balsa wood. The magnetic constructions as products are offered to the consumer coated with balsa as shown on the pitch video and the "5+5=10 interactions" video and as shown above in the photos and videos of the product members as perks. They will not be offered as the above 2 videos show all the prototypes, which they have the magnets exposed in the symmetries of the magnetic constructions. These are prototypes and we want as prototypes to be able to see the arrangement of each symmetry, but these are not the finished product. The finished products have all the magnets fully sealed, protected and covered with balsa for safety reasons and the user never touches any magnet but only the balsa wood, which covers the magnets. The nickel coating on the magnets in some cases is reported to be possibly responsible for skin allergies and in this manner this probability is avoided since the user never comes in contact with any magnet. Of course, in the instructions of the products the inside symmetries and arrangements of the magnets are fully described and explained to the user.
Therefore, each magnetic device with its constructions is absolutely 100% safe, also with no chance whatsoever of a magnet flying out and injuring possibly the user. 






Do we offer a product that delivers all the scientific knowledge derived from the technology of the invention bibliographically to the community? 


2)  Yes. It is the second
product of the campaign’s goal, which is three books offered also as perks to the
community, covering the scientific aspect of the technology. We would like to
supply the community bibliographically with the scientific knowledge derived
from the technology of the invention and we offer three different books covering each
individual’s needs describing the magnetic arrangements of the permanent
magnets, the many different symmetries, the behavior of the magnetic lines, the
interactions, the interchangeable polarities etc. These books come with
explanatory text, figures and drawings and photos of the constructed assemblies
of the magnetic constructions, in three different publications, to satisfy the specific needs of every one.
What books are specifically offered as perks?
          A)  As seen below, the perk is named:  "The book: Magnetic system of  multiple interactions (Volumes I & II)" having the complete knowledge of the  whole technology 3+3=6 and 5+5=10 for a total of 16 interactions at an intermediate price. Volumes I & II contained in this book include 103 pages of figures in plans, elevations, sections and isometric views, photos of numerous constructed magnetic constructions and more than 129 pages of text fully explaining: 1) the interaction’s mechanism occurring from the specific behavior of the magnetic lines and 2) the specific/accurate design and construction of the newly developed poles and fields. The complete range of the "3+3=6" and "5+5=10" for a total of "16 interactions" is covered fully in this book seen right below:



                                               FRONT COVER OF THE BOOK


                                                 BACK COVER OF THE BOOK        
             

                           VIDEO OF FIGURES AND DRAWINGS OF THE BOOK
               B)  As seen below, the perk is named: "The book: Magnetic system of three interactions (Volume I)" having the full knowledge in
text, figures, drawings and photos of the 3+3=6 Interactions at an economical
price.  Volume I contained in this book includes more than 69 pages of figures in plans, elevations, sections, isometric views, photos of constructed magnetic constructions and more than 73
pages of text fully explaining: 1) the interaction’s mechanism occurring from
the specific behavior of the magnetic lines and 2) the specific/accurate design
and construction of the newly developed poles and fields. The complete range of the "3+3=6 interactions" is covered in this book seen right below:                                  




                                                  FRONT COVER OF THE BOOK                                           



                                                 BACK COVER OF THE BOOK    


                         




                          VIDEO OF FIGURES AND DRAWINGS OF THE BOOK
                 C)  As seen below, the perk is named: "The Handbook: Magnetic system of three interactions (Handbook of basics)"; a handbook having the basic technology in more than 31 pages of text, 32 figures
and photos at a very economical price. The basics of the technology’s scientific functions are covered in detail and fully described in one configuration that can perform the "3+3=6 Interactions". This handbook of basics delivers all the information for someone interested in the basic foundation that forms the science of the technology, however it is not full or complete in its coverage
as Volume I and Volumes I & II are. It is seen right below:                                  





                                            FRONT COVER OF THE HANDBOOK                                      


                                            BACK COVER OF THE HANDBOOK      


           





                                FIGURES AND DRAWINGS OF THE HANDBOOK

What are some examples of products that can be manufactured utilizing the interactions of the invention?

Below are some indicative
examples of the potential applications that can be manufactured by some of the
industrial sectors if the invention is utilized:
1) The "ATTRACTIVE NO CONTACT"
interaction, where one "magnetic construction" attracts the other
with a complete air gap between them, gives the possibility of an application so
that a train engine - real size or toy or robot size - can be connected with the wagon and each wagon with the
next wagon, possessing a complete air gap in-between, with magnets/electromagnets positioned according to the innovation's technology. 
2) Another case is the opposite
application in regard to the first above, where a repulsive interaction of the magnetic constructions occurs at the greater distances and when
these come closer appears a strong attractive force joining the magnetic
constructions. This case can have multiple applications in lifting machines
and cranes, industrial machinery applications, automotive industry, space technology, in nanotechnology and robotics.
3) From the first example is created the
“STABLE BALANCE” interaction and from the second example is created the
“UNSTABLE BALANCE” both of them producing the simultaneous co-existence of the
homogeneous and heterogeneous fields causing immobility of the bodies. These
fields of "BALANCE PRODUCTION" can be used in static and kinetic constructional applications giving the
possibility of new assemblies.
4) From the five interactions technology is produced
the "INTERLOCKING NO CONTACT" interaction, having as a result the two confronted  bodies to function as one without however touching and without exerting any
repulsive or attractive force to each other. This technology is beneficial for
the non-touch magnetic power transmission constructions transmitting motion from an
energetic to a pathetic spindle-shaft achieving 100% non-friction involvement
and can be used in the manufacturing of non-touch bearings, gears, couplings
and multiple assemblies of power transmission. Also prosthetic members in
humans can be built with this technology having an extremely low coefficient of
friction between the member joints.
COMPLETELY NEW TYPES OF MAGNETIC INTERACTIONS AS NEVER BEFORE BEEN OBSERVED IN MAGNETISM:
The "ATTRACTIVE NO CONTACT" interaction, where one solid body "magnetic construction" attracts the other solid body "magnetic construction" with  a complete air gap between them.
The “STABLE BALANCE” interaction and the “UNSTABLE BALANCE” both of them producing the simultaneous co-existence of the homogeneous and heterogeneous fields causing immobility of the bodies.
The "INTERLOCKING NO CONTACT" interaction, having as a result the two confronted solid bodies to function as one without however touching and without exerting any repulsive or attractive force to each other.



What is the initial funding goal and what is our program in investing wisely the contributed amount?

The need:
The above two products as 1) magnetic devices and 2) books have the important need of your support for covering the final cost of producing the manufacturing of the two different types of  magnetic devices and for covering the publication costs of the three
different books. 
All the prototypes-devices are completely ready - in all stages of 
R&D - for manufacturing and also the books are completed - in all 
stages from editing to proof reading and final corrections.The amount needed for covering the cost of producing the manufacturing of the two different types of devices and publishing the three different books is calculated at 20.000 USD total initial flexible funding goal. This is our initial funding goal and it is flexible because we will be able to fulfill all our perk obligations, independently of the reached goal and that is our promise and guarantee to the community in regard to the integrity of our campaign offers. 
The delivery of the perks:
The perks regarding the three books will be ready for delivery in September 2016 and all the perks regarding the magnetic devices and its members will be ready for delivery in October 2016  (please view timeline's last table).
What happens if the initial funding goal is over-passed?

If the initial funding goal is over-passed we will be able to initialize our stretch goals (please view below text on stretch goals) in regard to the creation of the open source interactive platform and also offer some surprise perks in regard to manufacturing more needed by you arrangements of symmetries for the magnetic constructions. 
What is our relationship and participation regarding the community's needs?

We need your feedback, your suggestions and needs are important to us;  whether you are an individual, a research team or a scientist, a professor or a high school, college or university physics laboratory responsible person and you would like more info. get in touch; we want to satisfy your specific needs.
If the real world is now: 16 magnetic interactions vs the known two, one can imagine what more and new real, virtual or imaginary creations can be invented by all you geniuses out there! 




What are the
stretch goals of the open source interactive platform?

3) The third product of the campaign is our offer to the community to build together with the community an open source interactive platform and will be programmed by us in the stretch goals in the very specific stages of creation. The stretch goals then will include what
we would like to offer as scientific knowledge of the technology to everyone in
the community, allowing each and every one to become a member of this open source interactive platform. It will possess as a subject the whole scientific data of the
“Magnetic system of multiple interactions” in its design, creation and
development. 


What will be our contribution and supply to this open source interactive platform?


              We will create the open source interactive platform with
all needed material and human personnel to support it, also, supply the source code
which will have the core aspects of all the details covering the whole new scientific aspect of the invention. Also,
we will work extensively and continuously for informing in the best way
possible the platform with the innermost scientific details involved in this
new magnetic technology enriching all the new design and construction
possibilities that arise. The enlisted members of the platform will be able to
enrich the code with their own knowledge, ideas and developments and have a
chance to interact with the designing of the platform’s data and designing
capabilities. 
Graphics, animation, forums and magnetic interactions in real time:
               The platform will possess capabilities in graphics enriched by scientific data of each different case, animations of interactions in real time, including all the cases of the invention and all its accomplished interactions. Forums will be built according to the subjects concerning the
needs of the members and groups will be able to form and work on specific
projects, whether scientific, technological or theoretical.
Magnetic database, public domain and private sector involvement:
     Also, this open platform
will become an important bibliographical magnetic/electromagnetic database for
organizations, universities, colleges, libraries and also interested companies,
since there will be the possibility of sharing the knowledge with each member
in the community. This will give ignition to many other initiatives that will
occur since the world of open share especially in valuable knowledge subjects
is very fast growing and is also becoming very valuable in the public domain but also in the private sector. The educational process and delivery of scientific and technological information of the platform will be extremely valuable, since this technology is very far ahead of the current bibliographical knowledge
and the platform will enable all educators and students to not only expand their know-how capabilities but also effectively use the
new magnetic findings and possibilities. 
Open architecture scientific know-how of the "core technology":
We are offering an open-architecture technology; we keep all rights reserved for the inventive intellectual and industrial patented scale of the technology and all copyrights for the intellectual inventiveness of the scientific work and scientific findings. However, everything else that does not involve patents and copyrights, we offer it as an open-architecture platform able to incorporate an endless number of magnetic and electromagnetic products that will use the science and technology of the invention as a "core technology".
Your support is very important for creating this open source interactive platform and that is the reason we have placed it in this campaign as a need that will be funded by the stretch goals.


Risks & Challenges

The invention took 24 years of extremely hard work to become a
reality. It took another 12 years in R&D to be refined in all its aspects
and details, to be complete in every aspect, theoretical, technological and
scientific wise. To possess hundreds of prototype symmetries of permanent
magnet arrangements ready right now to be manufactured, to be able to have
ready these prototypes for consumer designed products, so as products they are
100% safe for use. To prepare the three books with the scientific know-how
involved in the technology of the invention. Also, it took 4 years from 2012 up
to now for the patent applications, international and national to be published,
to be granted and to be patent pending and also all the patent work had to be
prepared in a very complete legal manner so that the technology would be
patented in a correct legal manner.  


Presently, with your support which we believe combined with our guaranteed human presence in all types of transactions, we do have a strong
belief that all new challenges and risks that might come in our way - and we do
not under-estimate them - will be over-passed with success.

















Are the products completely ready for use?
Yes, they are completely ready, as you take them out of the package you can start right away to perform the experiments.



PRECAUTIONS IN REGARD TO MAGNETIC FIELDS: If you wear pacemakers or implanted heart defibrillators the magnetic
devices are not suitable for use by you. You might experience
illness due to your pacemaker’s switching into test mode. Your heart
defibrillator might stop working. If you wear these devices
you have to stay at least 2 meters away from the magnetic devices, you can view
them at a distance but you are strongly advised not to use them. Warn others who might
wear these devices to stay away and not use the magnetic devices.
- Although the experiments are exciting and also surprising and interest very much the children, please consider that magnets are not toys and children should always be guided by an adult when using the magnetic devices which are magnetic scientific instruments.
- Please use and store the magnetic devices as scientific instruments away from devices that might be de-magnetized.

story:
Short Summary

We are a sponsorship development agency based in London UK and we raise money for international creative community projects which develop income generating skills for talented people in hard to reach places around the world.

In response to the emergence of the refugee camp crisis, we will be setting up IAB Pop Up Schools for all ages.

There is a need for 'normality' within the camps, which are filled with talented refugee’s who have been uprooted from their life to discover a better life for themselves and their family.

To fulfill our mission of connecting People to their Passion for a Purpose, we are calling out to you to Help us Help refugees in hard to reach places and claim their lives back.



What We Need & What You Get

With your support, thousands of refugees can reconnect to their passion, fulfilling a purpose which provides group and individual recreational activities, building and developing new skills to provide positive creative outlets, creative therapy, life skills and a potential income for the works produced.

Refugee camps are filled with professionals such as lawyers, teachers, doctors, artists who just need the tools and resources to make a difference and many more men, women and children with dreams and aspirations to learn.

With your support, we can provide educational and recreational resources to those who desperately need materials to provide opportunities for themselves. By doing so, we truly help them by providing them with the tools to Create and Build as a community.

The money raised will be used to buy:

Art & craft supplies for ALL ages

Stationery and writing books

Educational / Reference books (within a wide sector of studies inc law, science, politics, architecture, agriculture, language etc)

Entrepreneurial / Motivational books (in populated languages)

Children books, educational / toys

In addition to clothes and other useful resources such as DIY tool kits, sewing kits,first aid kits, computers, rechargeable batteries etc.


The Impact

Our goal is simple. For all communities to live with dignity and become self-reliant through income generating activities. Developing vocational training and skills which benefit families and their community. In addition to providing opportunities for academic studies and creative artistic expression.

Through supplying resources, we not only provide positive and practical solutions to the challenges our refugees face but we also offer an alternate path that will not only build individuals and give them a positive outlook of their future but also the entire community.

Risks & Challenges


Our main challenge is the fact that we can not reach out to every individual in every camp who needs help or support but we try to overcome this by merging our services with as many front line aid workers, charities and volunteers as possible around the world who give us a direct report of what is needed, which may be different in each individual camp.

We do anticipate an overflow of donated goods to send to the camps and if we are unable to collect the goods straight away, depending on the size/amount of goods, we can arrange deliveries which we have factored into the overall target goal.

Most of the camps we provide resources to may also require ongoing support and items needing to be replaced which makes our connection with you integral. So please continue to show your support and share our page with as many people as possible.

We will also send updates of the progress we are all making and the impact that has been made through your generosity.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position where they can contribute funds or goods so there are other ways you can support this cause:

  • Please help us get the word out by telling friends, family and work colleagues/ businesses to donate their supplies or to raise funds for us.
  • Alternatively, you can share our page via your social network

story:
Mercury Cafe Video Recording A Success!
Sample The Soundtrack:

Listen To Sample
Taste a segment of the show recorded at the Mercury Cafe on May 22nd, 2016. The video and sound recordings at the Mercury Cafe are the foundation of the project. Half of the funding budget goes into post production editing to make a series of short videos from the Mercury show. Some of the soundtrack will also be released as podcasts.


The Project:

Social media enables us to spread awareness waves throughout the planet with unprecedented speed and impact.  I want your help generating an awareness wave.  A wave that summons courage, awakens hope, and invites people to step into their power. A wave transmitted through Facebook and YouTube video.  A wave designed to catch people's attention in today's sound byte oriented, mobile device connected world and invite them into a deeper conversation.


The Challenge:

  • What kind of future do our collective actions beckon?
  • What is our personal responsibility in shaping those actions?
  • How do we show up in the world?
  • What impact do we have?
The time is now!  Our institutions are struggling to address the complex challenges we face.  Paralysis grips our politics, consumed with blame and determination to make the “other side” fail, no matter the cost.  Profit and demographic captive media is obsessed with delivering only news that conforms to what we want to hear.

Our times clamor for profound transformation.  There is a deep hunger for fresh vision, for a new way forward.  This project is intended to feed that fresh vision, to help explore this new way by creating a series of short videos exploring topics such as courage, authenticity, freedom, and awareness.

Timing is Key:

Strike while the iron is hot. Taking advantage of the concern and energy stimulated by the presidential race, the videos will be released before the Republican and Democratic national conventions in July and continually promoted throughout the election.  The video is strictly nonpartisan.  It is truly a cry for awareness, understanding, and empowerment that transcends our current political paradigm.


The Video:

On May 22nd, 2016, I will professionally shoot the core of this video before a live audience at the Mercury Cafe in Denver, Colorado. This event will contain a combination of spoken word, poetry, and music.  Short engaging segments will be lifted from the shoot and featured on YouTube and Facebook.


The Live Performance:

The video recording of the Live Love Now: Decide live performance on May 22nd went well. It should produce several YouTube shorts.


Budget:

  • $1200.00  (20.00%)  Live Show Production Including: Talent, Sound Engineering, And Camera Team.
  • $3000.00  (50.00%)  Post Shoot Video Production, Including Production Of Short Promotional Segment.
  • $1000.00  (16.67%)  Video Placement And Promotion On YouTube And Facebook.
  •  $800.00  (13.33%)  Campaign Logistics And Overhead (Including Indiegogo Fees, Credit Card Processing, And Perk Fulfillment).


Follow Through:

This funding campaign launches the Live Love Now Project intended to include a YouTube channel, a series of books, and a library of MP3 downloads and CDs, all devoted to expanding human consciousness, promoting compassionate interaction, building conscious community, and honoring the autonomy of the individual.  Live Love Now aspires to serve humanity by helping cooperatively address intractable challenges we humans face.

Exceeding the campaign fundraising goals will hasten the development of the Live Love Now Project, with more short video segments taken from the initial show, and production of additional videos, and the full-fledged launch of the Live Love Now YouTube channel.

If the project is not fully funded, the initial video will be shorter, with less attention given to post shooting enhancement.  In any event, the production at the Mercury Cafe on May 22nd will be filmed.


About:

Instigator: David Steele
Philosopher, poet, writer, and life coach, David has studied and taught a wide variety of interpersonal communication skills over the last forty years. He has also studied mathematics, metaphysics, mythology, Tai Chi Ch'uan, computer science, cooking, and international politics.

David is a founding member of the Rocky Mountain Compassionate Communication Network. He teaches classes on compassionate communication and consults with both groups and individuals on easing tense situations.

Aspiring to freedom, both personal and communal, David has an unwavering devotion to the well-being of the planet. He longs for the day when we share a respect for each other that leaves no room for pretense and deception, for the day when our faith in ourselves is secure and we are not threatened by expressions of truth that differ from our own.

“David was born under fiery Aries, the sign of creation. To a mythologist, Aries represents the choice to invoke light or succumb to darkness: transformation or annihilation. The ancient bards, chosen of the fire god Apollo, were the true warriors of old; Homer, not Agamemnon, possessed the power to transform his world. Our poets, not our generals, wield the weapon of transformation in this age. David Steele has chosen to take up that weapon.” - Seth Henry

Musicians: SETH with Art Compost & the Word Mechanics
Should you find yourself in Denver on a Sunday night, you can check out Art Compost & the Word Mechanics at the legendary Mercury Cafe. This improvisational musical-poetic ensemble invites poets, singers, musicians from the audience to join in a weekly Jam Before the Slam (an open mic & poetry slam follows).

Video Production: The Studio Nova
The Studio Nova serves up "Meaningful Media" with a slant on holistic living and personal development. It's their passion to connect you with businesses that promote a sense of thriving, to entertain, educate, or simply inspire a new interest.

They produce media that fosters you to create and grow! They offer all aspects of video production from concept to editing and everything in between. Priding themselves on their professionalism they truly enjoy the creative process that naturally follows from a true collaboration with their clients.

Venue: The Mercury Cafe
The Mercury Cafe's exploration of food, the arts, politics and community began on the Ides of March, 1975 in Indian Hills, Colorado. After several incarnations in Denver, they settled in the center of Denver in 1990, opening on Halloween.

The Mercury Cafe serves locally-sourced vegetables, fruits, grains, meat, fish and bar selections, augmented with fair trade imports. Theirs is an organic menu with meat/fish, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten free choices. They treasure local farmers, ranchers, vintners, and distilleries.

Artistic expression is an ongoing part of the Mercury Cafe's menu. They host dancing to live bands, have produced numerous plays, and opened their stage to musicians from all over the world. The Mercury Cafe’s Poetry Slam Team has been a finalist in the National Poetry Slam Competition every year for the past 10 years, including winning the title in 2006.

$3000.00  (50.00%)  Post Shoot Video Production, Including Production Of Short Promotional Segment.
$1000.00  (16.67%)  Video Placement And Promotion On YouTube And Facebook.
 $800.00  (13.33%)  Campaign Logistics And Overhead (Including Indiegogo Fees, Credit Card Processing, And Perk Fulfillment).


Follow Through:

This funding campaign launches the Live Love Now Project intended to include a YouTube channel, a series of books, and a library of MP3 downloads and CDs, all devoted to expanding human consciousness, promoting compassionate interaction, building conscious community, and honoring the autonomy of the individual.  Live Love Now aspires to serve humanity by helping cooperatively address intractable challenges we humans face.Exceeding the campaign fundraising goals will hasten the development of the Live Love Now Project, with more short video segments taken from the initial show, and production of additional videos, and the full-fledged launch of the Live Love Now YouTube channel.If the project is not fully funded, the initial video will be shorter, with less attention given to post shooting enhancement.  In any event, the production at the Mercury Cafe on May 22nd will be filmed.


About:

Instigator: David Steele

Philosopher, poet, writer, and life coach, David has studied and taught a wide variety of interpersonal communication skills over the last forty years.  He has also studied mathematics, metaphysics, mythology, Tai Chi Ch'uan, computer science, cooking, and international politics.David is a founding member of the Rocky Mountain Compassionate Communication Network.  He teaches classes on compassionate communication and consults with both groups and individuals on easing tense situations. 

Aspiring to freedom, both personal and communal, David has an unwavering devotion to the well-being of the planet.  He longs for the day when we share a respect for each other that leaves no room for pretense and deception, for the day when our faith in ourselves is secure and we are not threatened by expressions of truth that differ from our own. “David was born under fiery Aries, the sign of creation. To a mythologist, Aries represents the choice to invoke light or succumb to darkness: transformation or annihilation. The ancient bards, chosen of the fire god Apollo, were the true warriors of old; Homer, not Agamemnon, possessed the power to transform his world. Our poets, not our generals, wield the weapon of transformation in this age. David Steele has chosen to take up that weapon.”
- Seth Henry
Musicians:  SETH with Art Compost & the Word MechanicsShould you find yourself in Denver on a Sunday night, you can check out Art Compost & the Word Mechanics at the legendary Mercury Cafe. This improvisational musical-poetic ensemble invites poets, singers, musicians from the audience to join in a weekly Jam Before the Slam (an open mic & poetry slam follows). 

Video Production:  The Studio Nova

The Studio Nova serves up "Meaningful Media" with a slant on holistic living and personal development. It's their passion to connect you with businesses that promote a sense of thriving, to entertain, educate, or simply inspire a new interest. 

They produce media that fosters you to create and grow!   They offer all aspects of video production from concept to editing and everything in between. Priding themselves on their professionalism they truly enjoy the creative process that naturally follows from a true collaboration with their clients. 

Venue:  The Mercury Cafe

The Mercury Cafe's exploration of food, the arts, politics and community began on the Ides of March, 1975 in Indian Hills, Colorado.  After several incarnations in Denver, they settled in the center of Denver in 1990, opening on Halloween.
The Mercury Cafe serves locally-sourced vegetables, fruits, grains, meat, fish and bar selections, augmented with fair trade imports. Theirs is an organic menu with meat/fish, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten free choices. They treasure local farmers, ranchers, vintners, and distilleries.
Artistic expression is an ongoing part of the Mercury Cafe's menu. They host dancing to live bands, have produced numerous plays, and opened their stage to musicians from all over the world.  The Mercury Cafe’s Poetry Slam Team has been a finalist in the National Poetry Slam Competition every year for the past 10 years, including winning the title in 2006.

story:
My name is Eason Robinson and I am a graduate student at the University of Baltimore studying Human Service Administration with a concentration in Non Profit Management. I am raising money to launch a literacy program in Grange Hill, Jamaica summer 2017. The money raised will be used to purchase 10 Ipad's that I will use to serve youth and adults age 8-25. These sessions will include literacy programs, academic skill, resume writing, job readniess, and college prep. I will also use the Ipad's to collect data and present the data to community leaders.

My plan is to set up in different communities 3 days a week 5 hours a day and hold different sessions using applications on Ipad's using wifi. I will also create surveys to collect data to build the future of this program. Your donation will help educate a community and build future competent leaders.

"Knowledge Paves the way to love, and love in its turn fosters understanding, and leads one along the path of great common achievements" - H.I.M.

"Education of the youth is the surest guarantee for a better life" - H.I.M.

 You can make a contribution by donating here or directly to my paypal at RobinsonEE@yahoo.com

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We need 10 iPads to launch our programs by Summer 2017
  • All givers will receive a free nights (1) stay coupon at our Guest House in Jamaica.
  • If we do not reach our final goals all funds will go towards obtaining as many iPads as possible.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • This project is important because it will increase the academic skills and life skills in the Grange Hill Community.
  • I will capture data to assure all information is collected to be analyzed for future programs.
  • Your donation will be used directly to impact young children and adults age 8-25.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • I may not be able to have enough iPads for the entire community so I will break them up into different sessions 3 times a week. I will also have sign ups to organize different sessions
  • It may be a challenge creating a competent team to help conduct these sessions. I plan to conduct interviews to establish a team of 3-5 volunteers.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this on your social media sites, with friends, and community organizations.
  • You can easily access the share tool on this page.

story:
HELP US BUILD THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE

A place to inspire our youth to excel at math and science while exploring the many wonders of Ancient Egypt.  

We are looking to fund the buildout of THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE flagship venue.  The space was recently acquired in midtown Manhattan, below are pictures of it in its present state, as well as the concept art illustrating its final look.

Ultimately we will turn this space into a museum grade venue, ready to hold events, celebrations, and the ultimate birthday parties.  THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE will cater to individual children and the specific wonders of Ancient Egypt that they wish to engage; From bugs to astronomy to math to .....  Their event will revolve around the interests they wish to explore.   

From the moment a child walks through the doors of THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE, their mind is opened and stimulated to not only have fun, but to learn and see that the impossible is totally possible.

Parents, teachers and school administrators all agree that we can’t continue to let school budget cuts and the "steam roller" of standardized tests, erode away at the enormous potential and rich diversity of our youth toward the study of math and science. 

The many fascinating aspects toward learning and appreciating math and science from "back in the day" have been squeezed out of the classroom process and replaced with homogenized exams. Educators across the academic spectrum agree that we need to find new and creative ways to inspire those who have become uninspired or feel lost in the "factory" of standardized education.  

 

THE PHARAOH’S HOUSE concept of combining the exploration of the many fascinating aspects of Ancient Egypt within a math and science program for kids is sheer brilliance!

Science Consultant, Dmitry Yavich, PhD

 

According to the National Council of Teachers of Mathematics - Young learners' future understanding of mathematics requires an early foundation based on a high-quality, challenging, and stimulating mathematics education. Young children in every setting should experience mathematics through effective, research-based curricula and teaching practices.

That’s why (in circa 2016) I founded THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE.  We are the “Harvard / MIT” of math and science exploration and inspiration, all through the “lens” of the Ancient Egyptians, but we need your financial assistance to buildout our space.  THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE has an engaging hands-on approach to learning and comprehending math and science for children - called Pharaoh Scientist. 

Our space in its current state

    

However, following your generous financial support, new life will be breathed into this facility, so each child's creative idea generation process becomes stimulated, their focus is now shifted to the imaginal, the achievable, the possible, all as we explore Ancient Egypt form the lens of math and science. 

 

Projected final look of THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE.  

From the moment children walk into THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE, we want them to be enchanted to open up that creative and analytical genius that's waiting to be challenged and inspired. Reawaken their natural curiosity that's being suppressed under the weight of preparing for the next set of standardized tests. 

In addition to holding the palatial crowning birthday ceremonies, the Pharaoh's inner court room is where would be Pharaoh Scientist will come to learn all about the Pharaoh's mathematicians, scientists, scribes, archaeologists and artist; moreover, how they too have the genius to design and create the very ideas from their dreams.     

Again, I’m here today seeking funding to build out our flagship space to museum grade.  I want THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE to be encouraging kids in the study of math and science, as soon as possible, and thanks to your generous financial support, we can make this dream a reality.

Stand with us today and make a difference by contributing what you can, sharing this campaign with everyone you know that cares about improving and complementing the quality of education and by joining The Pharaoh's House Working Families Community.

 

$615,000 STRETCH GOAL!

Our flagship facility is centrally located in Manhattan’s Garment District, making it easily accessible from any of the surrounding boroughs, but it is currently just raw space in much need of an Ancient Egyptian "face lift."  We’re seeking this funding of $615,000 to build out our space so it reflects the aura and majesty of the Ancient Egyptian section found at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.  We need you to help us to spread the word to hit this new goal! 

An integral part of awakening the scientific genius in kids involves “placing” them in an atmosphere where exciting exploration abounds.  Ancient Egypt’s treasure trove of cultural and mystical icons and practices give children a more substantive and worldly experience which many parents will appreciate.  Date palms and majestic columns adorned with hieroglyphics transport your child to Ancient Egypt where mystery chambers, statues of gods and Pharaohs, and mystical icons awaken their imagination and approach to learning. 

Each child’s birthday celebration done at The Pharaoh’s House will be completely unique and customized to them.  Those interested in critters get the critter special, those interested in archeology get the dig, those wanting to know the power of Cleopatra, Hatshepsut (the woman who dared to become Pharaoh-King of Egypt), they will get to know that power!!!

Why Ancient Egypt you ask? Inspiring the love of math and science, through the “eyes” of the Ancient Egyptians is not only empowering, but historically accurate.  Ancient Egypt gives us a hands-on approach to not only learning, but art, and an elegance they may not otherwise be exposed too.

Because our flagship venue, in midtown Manhattan, will reflect the majesty of Ancient Egypt that will inspire creative thinking and discussions about those historical accomplishments, we will use this exuberance to cultivate their thinking and understanding of the practical applications of how math and science have been used to build one of the greatest civilizations in modern history - including the one we live in today. 


Additional Work Needed to Our Space: 

  • Replace major building systems (HVAC, electrical, plumbing, fire protection and code compliance improvements, including ADA).
  • Install state-of-the-art: audio/visual equipment, lighting, security and monitoring system.
  • Install acoustical shell, sound proofing and entertainment equipment.
  • Improve ceiling grid, painting, flooring and signage.

 

My name is Antonio Kenyatta and I thank for your interest and your GENEROUS CONTRIBUTION. 

 

How You Can Contribute: 

We’ve put together an exciting set of perks around our Pharaoh Scientist mission.

 

Contributor Plan

Tight on funds, we understand, but there are still plenty of ways to show your support for our Pharaoh Scientist Mission. First, register here, then immediately start sharing this amazing campaign with twenty (20) friends and ask them to share it with twenty (20) of their friends too. Use your favorite social media platforms to also help spread the word far and wide.

  • FULLY PRIVATE use of the entire facility for your child and 20 of their VIP guest.

 

How To Participate

To make this a win-win for everyone, the children and our supporters, we are also running a referral competition in which the person who raises the most awareness of this crowdfunding campaign and gets the most people to visit this Indiegogo page will win a FREE IPHONE 7. The runner-up will get their choice of one of our exclusive Pharaoh Scientist jacket, t-shirt or cap.

 

Participating Is Simple:

  1. If you don’t have an Indiegogo account, go and register by clicking here. When you are finished, come back to this page.
  2. At the top of this page use the share buttons to pass this campaign onto others that share your zeal for enhancing the overall educational experience for children.
  3. You can use the social media buttons, but also the Link button to generate your unique web link that points to this page. This link helps us to ensure we register that you referred the person to this page. Be sure to use these links...they include the information needed for us to register your referrals!
  4. Each time you share the campaign with these links we will track them in a running tally. We will regularly update everyone with the current rankings each week in our campaign updates.
  5. Importantly, we are awarding a prize to the person who gets the most people visiting this page, so try to spread the word as far and wide as you can! Every person who clicks on your link gets you a step closer to becoming the Pharaoh Scientist leader and helps raise much needed awareness about a truly valuable campaign!

 

KEEP READING TO FIND MORE DETAILS OF HOW TO PARTICIPATE 

 

In addition to this, the top 5 people who raise money for the campaign will also get a an ALL NEW special limited addition 100,000 Pharaoh Scientist t-shirt and cap!

 

Join Our Community

Community is at the heart of THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE and we are building a global community that will work together to help the Pharaoh Scientist program inspire and prod the intellectual genius in children around the globe.

We don't just want you to support the campaign by getting a perk, we want you to be a part of making history.

We are building a community of advocates, developers, teachers, scientists, business-people, artists, designers, translators and more. This community is coming together to bring their skills and talents to the table; we are not selfish; we believe that everyone can put their brick in this pyramid of enhancing and complementing the out of classroom learning experience.

We have only just started with a BOLD target of inspiring 100,000 children annually today, but in the near future we’re hoping to enthuse the mathematical and scientific genius in 10x the number of kids a year as we continue to grow and expand!

Join our community today and help change the life of a child that will shape and solve problems of the world tomorrow.

Come and join the growing The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community now.

 

Ways To Help

There are many ways in which you can play an essential role in the success of The Pharaoh’s House Community:

  1. Contribute! - a great place to start is to buy one of our awesome perks. Scroll up to find out more!
  2. Join the Community – Everyone is welcome, you too can become a Pharaoh Scientist! Come and be apart of The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community.
  3. Refer "tons" of Friends and Win Prizes - want to win a FREE iPhone 7 while also helping spread the word? To find out more scroll back up to "How To Participate."
  4. Create and Share Digital Content - we are encouraging authors, developers, content-creators and more to create content that will spread the word about the exciting world of math and science and more!
  5. Share and Tag Your Top 5 Children's Books - which children's books have been the most memorable for you? Share your Top 5 and tag 10 friends to share theirs too! When using social media, be sure to use the #pslearning hashtag.
  6. Create Your 'Learning Moment' Video - record a video and share on a video website (such as YouTube) about how learning has really impact your life. Give the video the title "Pharaoh Scientist: My Learning Moment." Be sure to share your video on social media too with the #pslearning hashtag!

Remember, be sure to join The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community it is packed with savings and lots of fun facts designed for children of all ages.

 

Your Questions, Answered

Why are you doing this?
This Indiegogo campaign is designed to further enhance the educational community, of teachers, students, parents and families as a collaborative team that are focused on providing more enhanced out of the classroom learning experiences for children. At THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE, we believe strongly in the power in community, but not just in the teams who create exciting learning environments, but the countless others who "play" a daily role in solving the many educational challenges.

Crowdfunding is a great way in which the general public can help contribute towards making THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE as successful as it can be both in terms of raising resources as well as raising awareness. We believe that everybody, from our backers on this campaign, to teams, to members of our new community, can make a real difference – and we’re humbled and thankful for each and every one of you.

Why the $615,000 figure?

After running the numbers and breaking down the various costs of the many moving parts and labor associated with building out a space that embodies the aura found in the Ancient Egyptian section of the MET, BUT where kids can come and immerse themselves in history and exploration, all the while learning valuable math and science skills. For such a winning platform, our Finance team determined that this money will cover many of these associated costs.

This is really just the first step and facility of many more to come. The more we raise, THE MORE KIDS WE CAN REACH – let’s raise 10x that this amount so we can further facilitate the learning successes of the Pharaoh Scientist program, today our annual target is to inspire 100,000 kids, but we’re not stopping there; our next goal is 10x that number ANNUALLY. Do the math and help us spread the word today!

How do we know the Pharaoh Scientist lessons will be successful?

To stimulate curiosity from historically arcuate real world experiences of the Ancient Egyptians, students are provided with play materials and loose parts, such as blocks, paper, crayons, and clay. As the children reenact, write, pretend play scenarios from ancient Egypt, we help mode and shape those experiences in a mathematical and or scientific way where they can gain a sense of the world around them. These hands on experiences will remain with them; moreover, they will be different along the various developmental stages of their elementary and middle school education.

During the Pharaoh Scientist lessons children are given “jobs” that make them responsible for their tasks and to interact with others on a development or construction of their event for the Pharaoh Scientist lesson. We strongly believe that grounding children in historical real world experiences will help them learn the mathematical and scientific aspects in a positive way that they will retain and build upon for decades.

Our process also takes into account the extent of the problem of how many kids can’t read, write or perform basic arithmetic today, and how attractive the Pharaoh Scientist program would be toward motivating those that have been unmotivated and its national appeal to prospective teams focused on enhancing the quality of education in under served communities.

With these exhaustive considerations accounted for, we are very confident that the Pharaoh Scientist program is going to net incredible results far and wide. If we didn't have confidence in this, we wouldn't launch Pharaoh Scientist in the first place.

How much money from the crowdfunding actually goes to the prize?

With the exception of the Indiegogo/Finance fees, every dollar goes towards the buildout of our space.

What payment methods do you accept?

We accept major credit cards.

Can I donate from outside the USA?

Absolutely! 

When will my perk prizes be delivered?

We are currently estimating shipping in March 2017.

I love what you are doing! How can I help?

Great question and thank you for stepping forward! Go and see the 8 ways in which you can help, all listed above. Also be sure to come and join The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community and find out more.

Is shipping included in the perks?

Yes.

Can I write-off my contribution with my taxes?

Yes.

I am a celebrity or public figure and would like to endorse and or support this program in a big way or help in some other way. How do I get in touch with you?

Please email Antonio Kenyatta, our Chief Pharaoh Scientist who can discuss this further with you.

Educators across the academic spectrum agree that we need to find new and creative ways to inspire those who have become uninspired or feel lost in the "factory" of standardized education.   THE PHARAOH’S HOUSE concept of combining the exploration of the many fascinating aspects of Ancient Egypt within a math and science program for kids is sheer brilliance! Science Consultant, Dmitry Yavich, PhD According to the National Council of Teachers of Mathematics - Young learners' future understanding of mathematics requires an early foundation based on a high-quality, challenging, and stimulating mathematics education. Young children in every setting should experience mathematics through effective, research-based curricula and teaching practices.That’s why (in circa 2016) I founded THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE.  We are the “Harvard / MIT” of math and science exploration and inspiration, all through the “lens” of the Ancient Egyptians, but we need your financial assistance to buildout our space.  THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE has an engaging hands-on approach to learning and comprehending math and science for children - called Pharaoh Scientist. Our space in its current state    However, following your generous financial support, new life will be breathed into this facility, so each child's creative idea generation process becomes stimulated, their focus is now shifted to the imaginal, the achievable, the possible, all as we explore Ancient Egypt form the lens of math and science.  Projected final look of THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE.  From the moment children walk into THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE, we want them to be enchanted to open up that creative and analytical genius that's waiting to be challenged and inspired. Reawaken their natural curiosity that's being suppressed under the weight of preparing for the next set of standardized tests. In addition to holding the palatial crowning birthday ceremonies, the Pharaoh's inner court room is where would be Pharaoh Scientist will come to learn all about the Pharaoh's mathematicians, scientists, scribes, archaeologists and artist; moreover, how they too have the genius to design and create the very ideas from their dreams.     Again, I’m here today seeking funding to build out our flagship space to museum grade.  I want THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE to be encouraging kids in the study of math and science, as soon as possible, and thanks to your generous financial support, we can make this dream a reality.Stand with us today and make a difference by contributing what you can, sharing this campaign with everyone you know that cares about improving and complementing the quality of education and by joining The Pharaoh's House Working Families Community. $615,000 STRETCH GOAL!Our flagship facility is centrally located in Manhattan’s Garment District, making it easily accessible from any of the surrounding boroughs, but it is currently just raw space in much need of an Ancient Egyptian "face lift."  We’re seeking this funding of $615,000 to build out our space so it reflects the aura and majesty of the Ancient Egyptian section found at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.  We need you to help us to spread the word to hit this new goal! An integral part of awakening the scientific genius in kids involves “placing” them in an atmosphere where exciting exploration abounds.  Ancient Egypt’s treasure trove of cultural and mystical icons and practices give children a more substantive and worldly experience which many parents will appreciate.  Date palms and majestic columns adorned with hieroglyphics transport your child to Ancient Egypt where mystery chambers, statues of gods and Pharaohs, and mystical icons awaken their imagination and approach to learning. Each child’s birthday celebration done at The Pharaoh’s House will be completely unique and customized to them.  Those interested in critters get the critter special, those interested in archeology get the dig, those wanting to know the power of Cleopatra, Hatshepsut (the woman who dared to become Pharaoh-King of Egypt), they will get to know that power!!!Why Ancient Egypt you ask? Inspiring the love of math and science, through the “eyes” of the Ancient Egyptians is not only empowering, but historically accurate.  Ancient Egypt gives us a hands-on approach to not only learning, but art, and an elegance they may not otherwise be exposed too.Because our flagship venue, in midtown Manhattan, will reflect the majesty of Ancient Egypt that will inspire creative thinking and discussions about those historical accomplishments, we will use this exuberance to cultivate their thinking and understanding of the practical applications of how math and science have been used to build one of the greatest civilizations in modern history - including the one we live in today. 
Additional Work Needed to Our Space: 
Replace major building systems (HVAC, electrical, plumbing, fire protection and code compliance improvements, including ADA).
Install state-of-the-art: audio/visual equipment, lighting, security and monitoring system.
Install acoustical shell, sound proofing and entertainment equipment.
Improve ceiling grid, painting, flooring and signage.
 My name is Antonio Kenyatta and I thank for your interest and your GENEROUS CONTRIBUTION.  How You Can Contribute: We’ve put together an exciting set of perks around our Pharaoh Scientist mission. 
Contributor PlanTight on funds, we understand, but there are still plenty of ways to show your support for our Pharaoh Scientist Mission. First, register here, then immediately start sharing this amazing campaign with twenty (20) friends and ask them to share it with twenty (20) of their friends too. Use your favorite social media platforms to also help spread the word far and wide.   CLEOPATRA Perks
100% of the first $5 of your donation goes toward our fund to provide FREE Pharaoh Scientist lessons to children in underserved communities. 

Digital Certificate - we will send you a digital certificate that you can use to show your support for the campaign.

 How To ParticipateTo make this a win-win for everyone, the children and our supporters, we are also running a referral competition in which the person who raises the most awareness of this crowdfunding campaign and gets the most people to visit this Indiegogo page will win a FREE IPHONE 7. The runner-up will get their choice of one of our exclusive Pharaoh Scientist jacket, t-shirt or cap. Participating Is Simple:
If you don’t have an Indiegogo account, go and register by clicking here. When you are finished, come back to this page.
At the top of this page use the share buttons to pass this campaign onto others that share your zeal for enhancing the overall educational experience for children.
You can use the social media buttons, but also the Link button to generate your unique web link that points to this page. This link helps us to ensure we register that you referred the person to this page. Be sure to use these links...they include the information needed for us to register your referrals!
Each time you share the campaign with these links we will track them in a running tally. We will regularly update everyone with the current rankings each week in our campaign updates.
Importantly, we are awarding a prize to the person who gets the most people visiting this page, so try to spread the word as far and wide as you can! Every person who clicks on your link gets you a step closer to becoming the Pharaoh Scientist leader and helps raise much needed awareness about a truly valuable campaign!
 KEEP READING TO FIND MORE DETAILS OF HOW TO PARTICIPATE  In addition to this, the top 5 people who raise money for the campaign will also get a an ALL NEW special limited addition 100,000 Pharaoh Scientist t-shirt and cap! Join Our CommunityCommunity is at the heart of THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE and we are building a global community that will work together to help the Pharaoh Scientist program inspire and prod the intellectual genius in children around the globe.We don't just want you to support the campaign by getting a perk, we want you to be a part of making history.We are building a community of advocates, developers, teachers, scientists, business-people, artists, designers, translators and more. This community is coming together to bring their skills and talents to the table; we are not selfish; we believe that everyone can put their brick in this pyramid of enhancing and complementing the out of classroom learning experience.We have only just started with a BOLD target of inspiring 100,000 children annually today, but in the near future we’re hoping to enthuse the mathematical and scientific genius in 10x the number of kids a year as we continue to grow and expand!Join our community today and help change the life of a child that will shape and solve problems of the world tomorrow.Come and join the growing The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community now. Ways To HelpThere are many ways in which you can play an essential role in the success of The Pharaoh’s House Community:

Contribute! - a great place to start is to buy one of our awesome perks. Scroll up to find out more!

Join the Community – Everyone is welcome, you too can become a Pharaoh Scientist! Come and be apart of The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community.

Refer "tons" of Friends and Win Prizes - want to win a FREE iPhone 7 while also helping spread the word? To find out more scroll back up to "How To Participate." 


Create and Share Digital Content - we are encouraging authors, developers, content-creators and more to create content that will spread the word about the exciting world of math and science and more!

Share and Tag Your Top 5 Children's Books - which children's books have been the most memorable for you? Share your Top 5 and tag 10 friends to share theirs too! When using social media, be sure to use the #pslearning hashtag.

Create Your 'Learning Moment' Video - record a video and share on a video website (such as YouTube) about how learning has really impact your life. Give the video the title "Pharaoh Scientist: My Learning Moment." Be sure to share your video on social media too with the #pslearning hashtag!
Remember, be sure to join The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community it is packed with savings and lots of fun facts designed for children of all ages. Your Questions, AnsweredWhy are you doing this?This Indiegogo campaign is designed to further enhance the educational community, of teachers, students, parents and families as a collaborative team that are focused on providing more enhanced out of the classroom learning experiences for children. At THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE, we believe strongly in the power in community, but not just in the teams who create exciting learning environments, but the countless others who "play" a daily role in solving the many educational challenges.Crowdfunding is a great way in which the general public can help contribute towards making THE PHARAOH'S HOUSE as successful as it can be both in terms of raising resources as well as raising awareness. We believe that everybody, from our backers on this campaign, to teams, to members of our new community, can make a real difference – and we’re humbled and thankful for each and every one of you.Why the $615,000 figure? After running the numbers and breaking down the various costs of the many moving parts and labor associated with building out a space that embodies the aura found in the Ancient Egyptian section of the MET, BUT where kids can come and immerse themselves in history and exploration, all the while learning valuable math and science skills. For such a winning platform, our Finance team determined that this money will cover many of these associated costs.This is really just the first step and facility of many more to come. The more we raise, THE MORE KIDS WE CAN REACH – let’s raise 10x that this amount so we can further facilitate the learning successes of the Pharaoh Scientist program, today our annual target is to inspire 100,000 kids, but we’re not stopping there; our next goal is 10x that number ANNUALLY. Do the math and help us spread the word today!How do we know the Pharaoh Scientist lessons will be successful?To stimulate curiosity from historically arcuate real world experiences of the Ancient Egyptians, students are provided with play materials and loose parts, such as blocks, paper, crayons, and clay. As the children reenact, write, pretend play scenarios from ancient Egypt, we help mode and shape those experiences in a mathematical and or scientific way where they can gain a sense of the world around them. These hands on experiences will remain with them; moreover, they will be different along the various developmental stages of their elementary and middle school education.During the Pharaoh Scientist lessons children are given “jobs” that make them responsible for their tasks and to interact with others on a development or construction of their event for the Pharaoh Scientist lesson. We strongly believe that grounding children in historical real world experiences will help them learn the mathematical and scientific aspects in a positive way that they will retain and build upon for decades.Our process also takes into account the extent of the problem of how many kids can’t read, write or perform basic arithmetic today, and how attractive the Pharaoh Scientist program would be toward motivating those that have been unmotivated and its national appeal to prospective teams focused on enhancing the quality of education in under served communities.With these exhaustive considerations accounted for, we are very confident that the Pharaoh Scientist program is going to net incredible results far and wide. If we didn't have confidence in this, we wouldn't launch Pharaoh Scientist in the first place.How much money from the crowdfunding actually goes to the prize?With the exception of the Indiegogo/Finance fees, every dollar goes towards the buildout of our space.What payment methods do you accept?We accept major credit cards.Can I donate from outside the USA?Absolutely! When will my perk prizes be delivered?We are currently estimating shipping in March 2017.I love what you are doing! How can I help?Great question and thank you for stepping forward! Go and see the 8 ways in which you can help, all listed above. Also be sure to come and join The Pharaoh’s House Working Families Community and find out more.Is shipping included in the perks?Yes.Can I write-off my contribution with my taxes?Yes.I am a celebrity or public figure and would like to endorse and or support this program in a big way or help in some other way. How do I get in touch with you?Please email Antonio Kenyatta, our Chief Pharaoh Scientist who can discuss this further with you.

story:
We are a karaoke party business, offering everything karaoke lovers want. Live band, traditional electronic karaoke, lively hosts, thousands of songs to choose from, all in a speakeasy setting - not a bar, more like a living room with piano, drums and everything you need for karaoke.

Speakeasy Karaoke makes you the Star!

Speakeasy Karaoke is located in the Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn. The business idea came from one of our 4 co-founders, Andria. She wanted a karaoke business to combine the live band karaoke that select clubs offer with traditional electronic karaoke. She enlisted her friends Jim, Gabi and Christoph to help launch the business. The 4 of us not only manage the business together we also run the parties – Jim and Christoph make up Double Trouble, our live band, while Andria and Gabi co-host. We are extremely passionate about the business, and our love for karaoke as well. We love to encourage people to sing, dance and have fun!

Contributions to our business will be applied to rent for the studio. Space in New York City is expensive, and this is the main cost we need to cover to keep our business running. Our business launched in October and we have already hosted a number of private events.

What We Need & What You Get

$3500 will cover the cost of rent, as well as marketing and advertising costs. We would like to keep the space since it has already been set up for parties, and the acoustics are perfect for a karaoke venue.

Our site: http://www.siegristrecords.com/speakeasykaraoke

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/speakeasykaraoke/

For any donations of $300 and $600 we will host your private karaoke party – customized and themed for any special occasion you’re celebrating. We welcome any music or other special requests as well. These perks are savings of at least $50 off our regular rates

Perks:

From just $5 to $600, there's something for everyone (even if you don't want to karaoke)

As a small business in competitive NYC we face many challenges. But we believe in Speakeasy Karaoke, and what we have to offer. Our karaoke is unique, as well as a lot of fun. Our party-goers have given us extremely positive feedback and word of mouth that has brought us more customers. 

We are truly invested, and work constantly to deliver personalized events, outstanding entertainment and awesome service. Failing to meet our financial goal threatens the continuation of our current business model.

Our goal over the next 3-6 months is to continue to grow Speakeasy Karaoke. Our next step is to offer Karaoke 2 Go, making our karaoke party services mobile. Perfect for weddings, bachelorette parties, house parties, and other special events.

We would sincerely appreciate any size donation you have to offer. Thank you so much for all your help and please share our business venture with your friends, especially fellow karaoke lovers.

story:
At a glance overview

  • The Wonder Book is a captivating children's picture book that tells the story of four kids who wander around and beyond their neighborhood wondering why things are the way they are and how they work. The story on each page expands onto your smartphone or tablet screen to help young readers understand why.
  • The Wonder Book works with the Morebots app which scans each page on a family safe platform.
  • Your help is needed to contribute to the printing and production costs by pre-ordering the book. You can do this by choosing a perk that best suits you from the list on the right hand side of the page.
  • The Wonder Book will be distributed in March 2017.

 

About the book

We need your help to print the first edition of a hard-cover children’s picture book. The Wonder Book will be over 50+ pages of wonder-filled expansions. My love for traditionally printed books is being fused with my love for technology. Kids will get the best of both worlds as they can scan each page of the printed story and interact with the book using smart technology.

Take a look for yourself...
Parents, take notice of the ‘I wonder why’ question posed on each page.

Prior to this campaign, we've only worked with major companies to create compelling booklets and stories that expand when scanned. Most recently, we've opened up our platform of Expanding Stories to other children's books--so look forward to expanding some of your favorite children's books.

Tell me more...

  • This is the first hard-cover book from the interactive media company Morebots, founded by the author of The Wonder Book, James Pritchett.
  • Morebots is on a mission to reach and teach kids early.
  • While The Wonder Book is first and foremost a beautiful story for children to enjoy, it also aims to engage kids more and help them learn along the way.
  • The Wonder Book is suitable for anyone aged from 3 to 10+ years old, but readers aged from three to eight years will find themselves reading it again and again and again.

Making it happen...


 

How will the money be used?

All funds received up to and including the goal amount of $25,000 will be used solely on printing and production costs of our first run and the scanning technology maintenance cost (less crowd funding fees for Indiegogo). As a startup media company the printing and production costs are by far the biggest expense for Morebots. Your support will help us print 5000 copies of the book which will be sold online and through select book stores.
 

Timing

The book will be in your hands in March 2017.

After the crowdfunding campaign ends, we’ll send you regular updates to keep you in the loop with the book production and printing schedule.

How does this help children’s literacy?

By supporting the creation of The Wonder Book you are taking the first step in helping Morebots create more scannable books. However with each contribution, we will donate a book to a library or day care in your name and list it on our official website.

What happens if we exceed the goal amount?

If we reach our campaign target, additional funds received from crowdfunding will be put towards other business start-up costs  such as printing promotional products, printing additional runs and beginning production of our second title.
